anya-e0809n:35_0: Bhiyyo rūpantarā sāha, cariyena ca katthaci;
anya-e0809n:41_0: Pumitthiyaṃ padaṃ dvīsu, sabbaliṅge ca tīsviti;
anya-e0809n:44_0: Bhiyyo payoga māgamma, sogate āgame kvaci;
anya-e0809n:58_0: Jino, sakko tu siddhattho, suddhodani ca gotamo.
anya-e0809n:60_0: Sakyasīho tathā sakya, muni cādiccabandhu ca;
anya-e0809n:62_0: Mokkho nirodho nibbānaṃ, dīpo taṇhakkhayo paraṃ;
anya-e0809n:63_0: Tāṇaṃ leṇa marūpañca, santaṃ sacca manālayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:70_0: Dukkhakkhayo byābajjhañca byāpajjaṃ (ṭīkā), vivaṭṭaṃ khema kevalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:71_0: Apavaggo virāgo ca, paṇīta maccutaṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0809n:73_0: Yogakkhemo pāra mapi, mutti santi visuddhiyo;
anya-e0809n:76_0: Khīṇāsavo tva’sekkho ca, vītarāgo tathā’ rahā;
anya-e0809n:80_0: Tidasā tva’marā devā, vibudhā ca sudhāsino;
anya-e0809n:81_0: Surā marū divokā cā, matapā saggavāsino.
anya-e0809n:83_0: Nijjarā’ nimisā dibbā, apume devatāni ca devatā eva devatāni, sakatthe nipaccayo (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n:85_0: Siddho bhūto ca gandhabbo, guyhako yakkha rakkhasā;
anya-e0809n:94_0: Vāsudevo hari harī (ṭīkā) kaṇho, kesavo cakkapāṇya’tha;
anya-e0809n:97_0: Haro vutto kumāro tu, khandho sattidharo bhave;
anya-e0809n:99_0: Sakko purindado deva, rājā vajirapāṇi ca;
anya-e0809n:103_0: Suranātho ca vajira, hattho ca bhūtapatya’pi.
anya-e0809n:106_0: Viḍojo tha sujā tassa sujātā’ssa (ṭīkā), bhariyā tha puraṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:108_0: Masakkasārā masakkasāro (sī.) vassoka, sārā cevā’ marāvatī;
anya-e0809n:114_0: Erāvaṇo gajo paṇḍu, kambalo tu silāsanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:117_0: Nandanaṃ missakaṃ citta, latā phārusakaṃ vanā.
anya-e0809n:123_0: Vimāno nitthiyaṃ byamhaṃ, pīyūsaṃ tvamataṃ sudhā;
anya-e0809n:124_0: Sineru meru tidivā, dhāro neru sumeru ca.
anya-e0809n:132_0: Kapparukkho tu santānā, dayo devaddumā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:134_0: Pācī patījhu’ dīci’tthī, pubba pacchima uttarā;
anya-e0809n:137_0: Erāvato erāvaṇo (sī.), amarakose pana erāvato eva atthi puṇḍarīko, vāmano kumudo’ ñjano;
anya-e0809n:140_0: Dhataraṭṭho ca gandhabbā, dhipo, kumbhaṇḍasāmi tu;
anya-e0809n:144_0: Aḷakā alakā (amarakosa) ḷakamandāssa, purī, paharaṇaṃ gadā;
anya-e0809n:147_0: Jātavedo sikhī joti, pāvako dahano’ nalo;
anya-e0809n:148_0: Hutāvaho’ ccimā dhūma, ketva’ggi gini bhānumā.
anya-e0809n:150_0: Tejo dhūmasikho vāyu, sakho ca kaṇhavattanī;
anya-e0809n:155_0: Kukkuḷo tu’ṇhabhasmasmi, maṅgāro’lāta mummukaṃ tikaṃ dittakaṭṭhādindhane (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n:161_0: Gandhavāho tathā vāyo, samīro ca sadāgati.
anya-e0809n:163_0: Vāyubhedā ime chu’ddha, ṅgamo cādhogamo tathā;
anya-e0809n:169_0: Vego javo rayo khippaṃ, tu sīghaṃ turitaṃ lahu;
anya-e0809n:170_0: Āsu tuṇṇa maraṃ cāvi, lambitaṃ tuvaṭaṃpi ca.
anya-e0809n:172_0: Satataṃ nicca maviratā, nārata santata manavaratañca dhuvaṃ;
anya-e0809n:173_0: Bhusa matisayo ca daḷhaṃ, tibbe’kantā’timatta, bāḷhāni;
anya-e0809n:174_0: Khippādī paṇḍake dabbe, dabbagā tesu ye tisu.
anya-e0809n:176_0: Aviggaho tu kāmo ca, manobhū madano bhave;
anya-e0809n:177_0: Antako vasavattī ca, pāpimā ca pajāpati.
anya-e0809n:179_0: Pamattabandhu kaṇho ca, māro namuci, tassa tu;
anya-e0809n:180_0: Taṇhā’ratī ragā dhītū, hatthī tu girimekhalo.
anya-e0809n:183_0: Vepacitti pulomo ca, kimpuriso tu kinnaro.
anya-e0809n:194_0: Abbhaṃ tīsvatha vassañca, vassanaṃ vuṭṭhi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:197_0: Meghanāde tu dhanitaṃ, gajjitaṃ rasitādi ca;
anya-e0809n:205_0: Indu cando ca nakkhatta, rājā somo nisākaro.
anya-e0809n:208_0: Sītaraṃsi nisānātho, uḷurājā ca mā pume.
anya-e0809n:210_0: Kalā soḷasamo bhāgo, bimbaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:211_0: Aḍḍho tvaddho upaḍḍho ca, vā khaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ pume.
anya-e0809n:213_0: Addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge, pasādo tu pasannatā;
anya-e0809n:214_0: Komudī candikā juṇhā, kanti sobhā juti cchavi.
anya-e0809n:217_0: Cihanaṃ cāpi sobhā tu, paramā susamā tha ca.
anya-e0809n:219_0: Sītaṃ guṇe, guṇiliṅgā, sīta sisira sītalā;
anya-e0809n:220_0: Himaṃ tuhina mussāvo, nīhāro mahikā pyatha.
anya-e0809n:222_0: Nakkhattaṃ joti bhaṃ tārā, apume tārako’ḷu ca;
anya-e0809n:225_0: Migasira magasira (sī.) maddā ca punabbasu, phusso pusso (ṭī.) cāsilesa’pi.
anya-e0809n:227_0: Māghā magha (sī.) ca phaggunī dve ca, hatthā cittā ca svātipi;
anya-e0809n:228_0: Visākhā’ nurādhā jeṭṭhā, mūlā’ sāḷhā duve tathā.
anya-e0809n:230_0: Savaṇo ca dhaniṭṭhā ca, satabhisajo pubbu’ttarabhaddapadā;
anya-e0809n:233_0: Sobbhānu kathito rāhu, sūrādī tu navaggahā;
anya-e0809n:234_0: Rāsi mesādiko bhadda, padā poṭṭhapadā samā.
anya-e0809n:240_0: Raṃsimā bhākaro bhānu, akko sahassaraṃsi ca.
anya-e0809n:242_0: Raṃsi ābhā pabhā ditti, ruci bhā juti dīdhiti;
anya-e0809n:243_0: Marīci dvīsu bhānvaṃ’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo.
anya-e0809n:255_0: Dasa khaṇamuhutto te, divaso tu ahaṃ dinaṃ.
anya-e0809n:261_0: Nisā ca rajanī ratti, tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave;
anya-e0809n:265_0: Andhakāro tamo nitthī, timisaṃ timiraṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:268_0: Vanasaṇḍo ghano megha, paṭalaṃ cā’ḍḍharatti ca.
anya-e0809n:271_0: Pāṭipado tu dutiyā, tatiyādī tithī tithi, tāyati pāletīti tithi, tā+iti (ṇvādi) dvisu.
anya-e0809n:276_0: Ghaṭikā saṭṭhya’ horatto, pakkho te dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0809n:280_0: Citto vesākha, jeṭṭho cā, sāḷho dvīsu ca sāvaṇo;
anya-e0809n:283_0: Māgasiro tathā phusso, kamena māgha phagguṇā;
anya-e0809n:290_0: Kamā hemanta gimhāna, vassānā utuyo dvisu.
anya-e0809n:293_0: Cha vā vasanto ca gimha vassānā;
anya-e0809n:294_0: Saradoti kamā māsā, dve dve vuttānusārena.
anya-e0809n:301_0: Vassa saṃvaccharā nitthī, sarado hāyano samā.
anya-e0809n:303_0: Kappakkhayo tu saṃvaṭṭo, yuganta palayā api;
anya-e0809n:308_0: Pāpañca kibbisaṃ verā, ghaṃ duccarita dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e0809n:311_0: Kusalaṃ sukataṃ sukkaṃ, puññaṃ dhamma manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:318_0: Hāso’ ttamanatā pīti, vitti tuṭṭhi ca nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:321_0: Pāmojjañca pamodo tha, sukhaṃ sātañca phāsva’tha;
anya-e0809n:322_0: Bhaddaṃ seyyo subhaṃ khemaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0809n:324_0: Dukkhañca kasiraṃ kicchaṃ, nīgho ca byasanaṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0809n:325_0: Dabbe tu pāpapuññāni, tīsvākicchaṃ sukhādi ca.
anya-e0809n:327_0: Bhāgyaṃ niyati bhāgo ca, bhāgadheyyaṃ vidhī’rito;
anya-e0809n:328_0: Atho uppatti nibbatti, jāti janana mubbhavo.
anya-e0809n:330_0: Nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ, padaṃ bījaṃ nibandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:331_0: Nidānaṃ pabhavo hetu, sambhavo setu paccayo.
anya-e0809n:333_0: Kāraṇaṃ yaṃ samāsannaṃ, padaṭṭhānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:334_0: Jīvo tu puriso’ttā tha, padhānaṃ pakatitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:336_0: Pāṇo sarīrī bhūtaṃ vā, satto dehī ca puggalo;
anya-e0809n:340_0: Rūpaṃ saddo gandha rasā, phasso dhammo ca gocarā;
anya-e0809n:341_0: Ālambā visayā te chā, rammaṇā lambaṇāni ca.
anya-e0809n:357_0: Kaḷāro kapilo nīla, pīte tha rocanappabhe;
anya-e0809n:358_0: Piṅgo pisaṅgo pyathavā, kaḷārādī tu piṅgale.
anya-e0809n:364_0: Naccaṃ naṭṭañca naṭanaṃ, nattanaṃ lāsanaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:365_0: Naccaṃ tu vāditaṃ gīta, miti nāṭumidaṃ tayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:370_0: Siṅgāro karuṇo vīra, bbhuta hassa bhayānakā;
anya-e0809n:371_0: Santo bībhaccha ruddāni, nava nāṭyarasā ime.
anya-e0809n:373_0: Posassa nāriyaṃ pose, itthiyā saṅgamaṃ pati;
anya-e0809n:380_0: Bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ bhāsā, vohāro vacanaṃ vaco;
anya-e0809n:381_0: Utti vācā girā vāṇī, bhāratī kathitā kathā (katthaci) vacī.
anya-e0809n:387_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho.
anya-e0809n:389_0: Iru nārī yaju sāma, miti vedā tayo siyuṃ;
anya-e0809n:390_0: Ete eva tayī nārī, vedo manto sutitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:392_0: Aṭṭhako vāmako vāma, devo caṅgīraso bhagu;
anya-e0809n:393_0: Yamadaggi ca vāsiṭṭho, bhāradvājo ca kassapo;
anya-e0809n:396_0: Kappo byākaraṇaṃ joti, satthaṃ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e0809n:402_0: Vitaṇḍasatthaṃ viññeyyaṃ, yaṃ taṃ lokāyataṃ iti;
anya-e0809n:403_0: Keṭubhaṃ tu kriyākappa, vikappo kavinaṃ hito.
anya-e0809n:408_0: Saññā, khyā, vhā samaññā cā, bhidhānaṃ nāma mavhayo;
anya-e0809n:411_0: Pañho tīsva nuyogo ca, pucchā pyatha nidassanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:414_0: Samā saṅkhepa saṃhārā, samāso saṅgaho pyatha;
anya-e0809n:417_0: Vohāro tu vivādo tha, sapanaṃ sapathopi ca;
anya-e0809n:422_0: Katthanā ca silāghā ca, vaṇṇanā ca nuti tthuti.
anya-e0809n:424_0: Thomanañca thomanaṃ vā (katthaci thomanaṃ thomanā dviliṅge) pasaṃsātha, kekā nādo sikhaṇḍinaṃ;
anya-e0809n:428_0: Pariyāyo vevacanaṃ, sākacchā tu ca saṃkathā;
anya-e0809n:432_0: Khepo nindā tathā kucchā, jigucchā garahā bhave;
anya-e0809n:449_0: Vitathaṃ tu musā cātha āhataṃ tu musātthakaṃ (katthaci, amarakose), pharusādī tiliṅgikā.
anya-e0809n:451_0: Sammā byayañcā vitathaṃ, saccaṃ tacchaṃ yathātathaṃ;
anya-e0809n:452_0: Tabbantā tīsva līkaṃ tva, saccaṃ micchā musā byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:460_0: Bindu gambhīra ninnādī, tyeva maṭṭhaṅgiko saro.
anya-e0809n:466_0: Sarā satta tayo gāmā, cekavīsati mucchanā;
anya-e0809n:469_0: Usabho dhevato ceva, chajja gandhāra majjhimā;
anya-e0809n:470_0: Pañcamo ca nisādoti, satte’te gaditā sarā.
anya-e0809n:472_0: Nadanti usabhaṃ gāvo, turagā dhevataṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:473_0: Chajjaṃ mayūrā gandhāra, majā koñcā ca majjhimaṃ.
anya-e0809n:479_0: Saresu tesu pacceke, tisso tisso hi mucchanā;
anya-e0809n:480_0: Siyuṃ tatheva tānāni ṭhānāni (bahūsu), satta satteva labbhare.
anya-e0809n:482_0: Tisso duve catasso ca, catasso kamato sare;
anya-e0809n:483_0: Tisso duve catassoti, dvāvīsati sutī siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:485_0: Uccatare rave tāro, thābyatte madhure kalo;
anya-e0809n:486_0: Gambhīre tu rave mando, tārādī tīsvatho kale;
anya-e0809n:490_0: Vīṇā ca vallakī satta, tantī sā parivādinī;
anya-e0809n:504_0: Ātojjaṃ tu ca vādittaṃ, vāditaṃ vajja muccate.
anya-e0809n:515_0: So tvā modo dūragāmī, vissantā tīsvito paraṃ.
anya-e0809n:517_0: Iṭṭhagandho ca surabhi, sugandho ca sugandhi ca;
anya-e0809n:518_0: Pūtigandhi tu duggandho, tha vissaṃ āmagandhi yaṃ.
anya-e0809n:523_0: Kasāvo nitthiyaṃ titto, madhuro lavaṇo ime;
anya-e0809n:524_0: Ambilo kaṭuko ceti, cha rasā tabbatī tisu.
anya-e0809n:528_0: Nayanaṃ tvakkhi nettañca, locanaṃ ca’cchi cakkhu ca.
anya-e0809n:530_0: Sotaṃ saddaggaho kaṇṇo, savanaṃ suti natthu tu;
anya-e0809n:531_0: Nāsā ca nāsikā ghānaṃ, jivhātu rasanā bhave.
anya-e0809n:533_0: Sarīraṃ vapu gattañcā, ttabhāvo bondi viggaho;
anya-e0809n:534_0: Dehaṃ vā purise kāyo, thiyaṃ tanu kaḷevaraṃ.
anya-e0809n:536_0: Cittaṃ ceto mano nitthī, viññāṇaṃ hadayaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:537_0: Mānasaṃ dhī tu paññā ca, buddhi medhā mati muti.
anya-e0809n:539_0: Bhūrī mantā ca paññāṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vijjā ca yoni ca;
anya-e0809n:543_0: Sampajaññaṃ tu nepakkaṃ, vedayitaṃ tu vedanā.
anya-e0809n:547_0: Ekaggatā tu samatho, avikkhepo samādhi ca.
anya-e0809n:549_0: Ussāhā’ tappa paggāhā, vāyāmo ca parakkamo;
anya-e0809n:550_0: Padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ cehā, uyyāmo ca dhiti tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:555_0: Ussoḷhī tva dhimattehā, sati tva nussati tthiya;
anya-e0809n:556_0: Lajjā hirī samānā tha, ottappaṃ pāpabhīrutā.
anya-e0809n:562_0: Dayā’ nukampā kāruññaṃ, karuṇā ca anuddayā;
anya-e0809n:563_0: Thiyaṃ veramaṇī ceva, viratyā’ rati cāpyatha.
anya-e0809n:565_0: Titikkhā khanti khamanaṃ, khamā mettā tu metya’tha;
anya-e0809n:566_0: Dassanaṃ diṭṭhi laddhitthī, siddhanto samayo bhave.
anya-e0809n:568_0: Taṇhā ca tasiṇā ejā, jālinī ca visattikā;
anya-e0809n:569_0: Chando jaṭā nikantyā’sā, sibbinī bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0809n:571_0: Abhijjhā vanatho vānaṃ, lobho rāgo ca ālayo;
anya-e0809n:572_0: Pihā manoratho icchā, bhilāso kāma dohaḷā;
anya-e0809n:573_0: Ākaṅkhā ruci vuttā sā, tvadhikā lālasā dvisu.
anya-e0809n:575_0: Veraṃ virodho viddeso, doso ca paṭighañca vā;
anya-e0809n:579_0: Baddhavera mupanāho, siyā soko tu socanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:582_0: Bhītitthi bhaya muttāso, bheravaṃ tu mahabbhayaṃ;
anya-e0809n:585_0: Ghoraṃ paṭibhayaṃ bhesmaṃ, bhayaṅkara mime tīsu.
anya-e0809n:587_0: Issā usūyā maccheraṃ, tu macchariya maccharaṃ;
anya-e0809n:588_0: Moho’vijjā tathā’ñāṇaṃ, māno vidhā ca unnati.
anya-e0809n:590_0: Uddhacca muddhaṭaṃ cātha uddhavaṃuddhaṃ dhāvati citta metenāti uddhavaṃ (ṭīkā),
anya-e0809n:594_0: Dveḷhakaṃ vicikicchā ca, kaṅkhā saṅkā vimatyapi.
anya-e0809n:597_0: Nicchayo niṇṇayo vutto, paṭiññā tu paṭissavo.
anya-e0809n:600_0: Parābhavo pya’ vaññā tha, ummādo cittavibbhamo.
anya-e0809n:602_0: Pemaṃ sineho sneho tha, cittapīḷā visaññitā;
anya-e0809n:605_0: Vilāso lalitaṃ līlā, hāvo heḷā ca vibbhamo;
anya-e0809n:608_0: Hasanaṃ hasitaṃ hāso, mando so mihitaṃ sitaṃ;
anya-e0809n:612_0: Parihāso davo khiḍḍā, keḷi kīḷā ca kīḷitaṃ;
anya-e0809n:613_0: Niddā tu supinaṃ soppaṃ, middhañca pacalāyikā.
anya-e0809n:615_0: Thiyaṃ nikati kūṭañca, dambho sāṭhyañca ketavaṃ;
anya-e0809n:616_0: Sabhāvo tu nissaggo ca, sarūpaṃ pakatitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:627_0: Vaggā bhūmi, purī, macca, catubbaṇṇa, vanādihi;
anya-e0809n:630_0: Vasundharā chamā bhūmi, pathavī medanī mahī;
anya-e0809n:631_0: Ubbī vasumatī go ku, vasudhā dharaṇī dharā;
anya-e0809n:632_0: Puthavī jagatī bhūrī, bhū ca bhūtadharā’ vanī.
anya-e0809n:634_0: Khārā tu mattikā ūso, ūsavā tūsaro tisu;
anya-e0809n:640_0: Pumbahutte kurū sakkā, kosalā magadhā sivī;
anya-e0809n:643_0: Vaṅgā videhā kambojā, maddā bhagga’ṅga sīhaḷā;
anya-e0809n:646_0: Loko ca bhuvanaṃ vuttaṃ, deso tu visayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:650_0: Saddalo harite dese, tiṇenā, bhinavena hi.
anya-e0809n:657_0: Raṭṭhaṃ tu vijitañcātha, purise setu āliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:659_0: Upāntabhū parisaro, goṭṭhaṃ tu gokulaṃ vajo;
anya-e0809n:660_0: Maggo pantho patho addhā, añjasaṃ vaṭumaṃ tathā.
anya-e0809n:662_0: Pajjo pajjā…. (ka.), yanañca padavī, vattanī paddhatitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:663_0: Tabbhedā jaṅgha, sakaṭa, maggā te ca mahaddhani.
anya-e0809n:668_0: Suppatho tu supantho ca, uppathaṃ tvapathaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:670_0: Chattiṃsaparamāṇūna, meko ṇu ca chattiṃsa te;
anya-e0809n:671_0: Tajjārī tāpi chattiṃsa, rathareṇu chattiṃsa te.
anya-e0809n:673_0: Likkhātā satta ūkā tā, dhaññamāsoti satta te;
anya-e0809n:674_0: Satta ṅgula’ mamu dviccha, vidatthi tā duve siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:676_0: Ratanaṃ tāni satteva, yaṭṭhi tā vīsatū sabhaṃ;
anya-e0809n:685_0: Puraṃ nagara mitthī vā, ṭhānīyaṃ puṭabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:686_0: Thiyaṃ tu rājadhānī rājaṭhānī (ṭī.) ca, khandhāvāro bhave tha ca.
anya-e0809n:688_0: Sākhānagara maññatra, yaṃ taṃ mūlapurā puraṃ;
anya-e0809n:689_0: Bārāṇasī ca sāvatthi, vesālī mithilā, ḷavī.
anya-e0809n:691_0: Kosambu, jjeniyo takka, silā campā ca sāgalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:692_0: Susumāragiraṃ saṃsumāra (ṭīkā) rāja, gahaṃ kapilavatthu ca.
anya-e0809n:697_0: Racchā ca visikhā vuttā, rathikā vīthi cāpyatha;
anya-e0809n:698_0: Byūho racchā anibbiddhā, nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca.
anya-e0809n:700_0: Catukkaṃ caccare magga, sandhi siṅghāṭakaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:701_0: Pākāro varaṇo cātha, udāpo uddāpa, uddāpa upakārikā.
anya-e0809n:703_0: Kuṭṭaṃ tu bhitti nārī tha, gopuraṃ dvārakoṭṭhako;
anya-e0809n:704_0: Esikā indakhīlo ca, aṭṭo tvaṭṭālako bhave.
anya-e0809n:706_0: Toraṇaṃ tu bahidvāraṃ, parikhātu ca dīghikā;
anya-e0809n:707_0: Mandiraṃ sadanā, gāraṃ, nikāyo nilayā, layo.
anya-e0809n:712_0: Okaṃ sālā khayo vāso, thiyaṃ kuṭi vasatya’pi;
anya-e0809n:713_0: Gehañcā, nitthi sadumaṃ, cetiyā, yatanāni tu.
anya-e0809n:715_0: Pāsādo ceva yūpo tha, muṇḍacchado ca hammiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:722_0: Sabhāyañca sabhā cātha, maṇḍapaṃ vā janālayo;
anya-e0809n:735_0: Gabbho ovarako vāsā, gāraṃ tu sayaniggahaṃ.
anya-e0809n:737_0: Itthāgāraṃ tu orodho, suddhanto’ ntepurampi ca;
anya-e0809n:744_0: Ālokasandhi vutto tha, laṅgī’tthī paligho bhave;
anya-e0809n:747_0: Chadanaṃ paṭalaṃ chadda, majiraṃ caccaro, ṅgaṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:750_0: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṃ dvāra, bāhā kūṭaṃ tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n:751_0: Dvārañca paṭihāro tha, ummāro dehanī, tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:753_0: Eḷako indakhīlo tha, thambho thūṇo pumitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:754_0: Pāṭikā, ḍḍhendupāsāṇe, giñjakā tu ca iṭṭhakā.
anya-e0809n:762_0: Saṅghāto pakkhapāso ca, mandiraṅgā tulā api;
anya-e0809n:763_0: Thiyaṃ sammujjanī ceva, sammajjanī ca sodhanī.
anya-e0809n:766_0: Atho kacavaro, klāpo, saṅkāro ca kasambupi.
anya-e0809n:768_0: Gharādibhūmi taṃ vatthu, gāmo saṃvasatho tha so;
anya-e0809n:769_0: Pākaṭo nigamo bhoga, maccādibhyo dhi tūdito ‘adhibhū’ti īrito kathito (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n:776_0: Manusso mānuso macco, mānavo manujo naro;
anya-e0809n:780_0: Budho vidvā vibhāvī ca, santo sappañña kovidā;
anya-e0809n:781_0: Dhīmā sudhī kavi byatto, vicakkhaṇo visārado.
anya-e0809n:783_0: Medhāvī matimā pañño, viññū ca vidūro vidū;
anya-e0809n:784_0: Dhīro vipassī dosaññū, buddho ca dabba viddasu.
anya-e0809n:786_0: Itthī sīmantinī nārī, thī vadhū vanitā, ṅganā;
anya-e0809n:787_0: Pamadā sundarī kantā, ramaṇī dayitā, balā.
anya-e0809n:789_0: Mātugāmo ca mahilā, lalanā bhīru kāminī;
anya-e0809n:790_0: Kumārikā tu kaññā tha, yuvatī taruṇī bhave.
anya-e0809n:794_0: Dhavatthinī tu saṅketaṃ, yāti yā sā, bhisārikā.
anya-e0809n:797_0: Rūpūpajīvinī vesī, kulaṭā tu ca bandhakī.
anya-e0809n:803_0: Vijātā tu pasūtā ca, jātāpaccā pasūtikā.
anya-e0809n:805_0: Dūtī sañcārikā dāsī, tu ceṭī kuṭadhārikā;
anya-e0809n:806_0: Vāruṇī, kkhaṇikā tulyā, khattiyānī tu khattiyā.
anya-e0809n:808_0: Dāro jāyā kalattañca, gharaṇī bhariyā piyā,
anya-e0809n:811_0: Sakhī tvā’lī vayassā tha, jārī cevā’ticārinī;
anya-e0809n:812_0: Pume tū’tu rajo pupphaṃ, utunī tu rajassalā.
anya-e0809n:817_0: Dhavotu sāmiko bhattā, kanto pati varo piyo;
anya-e0809n:825_1: jayampatī tu dampatī dampatīti padaṃ pulliṅga bahuvacanantaṃ ikārantaṃ,
anya-e0809n:826_0: Atha vassavaro vutto, paṇḍako ca napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:828_0: Bandhavo bandhu sajano, sagotto ñāti ñātako;
anya-e0809n:832_0: Amma, mbā jananī mātā, janetti janikā bhave;
anya-e0809n:842_0: Nattā vutto paputto tha, sāmibhātā tu devaro;
anya-e0809n:850_0: Sodariyo sagabbho ca, sodaro sahajo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:851_0: Mātāpitū te pitaro, puttā tu puttadhītaro.
anya-e0809n:854_0: Bālattaṃ bālatā bālyaṃ, yobbaññaṃtu ca yobbanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:856_0: Sukkā tu palitaṃ kesā, dayo tha jaratā jarā;
anya-e0809n:857_0: Puthuko pillako chāpo, kumāro bāla potakā.
anya-e0809n:861_0: Taruṇo ca vayaṭṭho ca, daharo ca yuvā susu;
anya-e0809n:864_0: Mahallako ca vuddho ca, thero jiṇṇo ca jiṇṇako;
anya-e0809n:865_0: Aggajo pubbajo jeṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho nujo.
anya-e0809n:869_0: Sīso’ttamaṅgāni siro, muddhā ca matthako bhave;
anya-e0809n:870_0: Keso tu kuntalo vālo, ttamaṅgaruha muddhajā.
anya-e0809n:879_0: Sīmanto tu mato nāri, kesamajjhamhi paddhati.
anya-e0809n:881_0: Lomaṃ tanuruhaṃ romaṃ, pamhaṃ pakhuma makkhigaṃ;
anya-e0809n:882_0: Massu vuttaṃ pumamukhe, bhū tvitthī bhamuko bhamu.
anya-e0809n:885_0: Vadanaṃ tu mukhaṃ tuṇḍaṃ, vattaṃ lapana mānanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:887_0: Dvijo lapanajo danto, dasano radano rado;
anya-e0809n:891_0: Gaṇḍo kapolo hanvitthī gaṇḍatthī (ṭī.) hanvatthī=hanu+itthī; hana+u (ṇvādi),
anya-e0809n:894_0: Galo ca kaṇṭho gīvā ca, kandharā ca sirodharā;
anya-e0809n:896_0: Aṅkitā tīhi lekhāhi, kambugīvā thavā matā.
anya-e0809n:898_0: Aṃso nitthī bhujasiro, khandho tassandhi jattu taṃ;
anya-e0809n:899_0: Bāhumūlaṃ tu kaccho, dho, tva’ssa passa manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:901_0: Bāhu bhujādvīsu bāhā, hattho tu kara pāṇayo;
anya-e0809n:905_0: Karasākhā, ṅgulī tā tu, pañca, ṅguṭṭho ca tajjanī;
anya-e0809n:906_0: Majjhimā nāmikā cāpi, kaniṭṭhā’ti kamā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:911_0: Ratanaṃ kukku hattho tha, pume karapuṭo,ñjali;
anya-e0809n:912_0: Karajo tu nakho nitthī, khaṭako muṭṭhi ca dvīsu.
anya-e0809n:917_0: Uro ca hadayaṃ cātha, thano kuca payodharā;
anya-e0809n:918_0: Cūcukaṃ tu thanaggasmiṃ, piṭṭhaṃ tu piṭṭhi nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:920_0: Majjho’nitthī vilaggo ca, majjhimaṃ kucchi catukkaṃ udare; 944-gāthāpi passitabbā tu dvisu;
anya-e0809n:923_0: Jaghanaṃ tu nitambo ca, soṇī ca kaṭi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:930_0: Asuci sambhavo sukkaṃ, pāyu tu purise gudaṃ;
anya-e0809n:931_0: Vā pume gūtha karīsa, vaccāni ca malaṃ chakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:933_0: Uccāro mīḷha mukkāro, passāvo mutta muccate;
anya-e0809n:936_0: Dvīsvadho nābhiyā vatthi, ucchaṅga’ṅkā tu’bho pume;
anya-e0809n:937_0: Ūru satthi pume ūru, pabbaṃ tu jāṇu jaṇṇu ca.
anya-e0809n:939_0: Gopphako pādagaṇṭhipi, pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi;
anya-e0809n:940_0: Pādaggaṃ papado pādo, tu pado caraṇañca vā.
anya-e0809n:943_0: Paṇḍake aṭṭhi dhātvitthī, galantaṭṭhi tu akkhako.
anya-e0809n:945_0: Kapparo tu kapālaṃ vā, kaṇḍarā tu mahāsirā;
anya-e0809n:946_0: Pume nhāru citthī sirā, dhamanī tha rasaggasā.
anya-e0809n:949_0: Tiliṅgikaṃ tu vallūra, muttattaṃ atha lohitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:951_0: Rudhiraṃ soṇitaṃ rattaṃ, lālā kheḷo elā bhave;
anya-e0809n:952_0: Purise māyu pittañca, semho nitthī silesumo.
anya-e0809n:954_0: Vasā vilīnasneho tha, medo ceva vapā bhave;
anya-e0809n:955_0: Ākappo veso nepacchaṃ, maṇḍanaṃ tu pasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:966_0: Kaṅkaṇaṃ karabhūsā tha, kiṅkiṇī kiṃkaṇī kiṃ kaṇikā (ka.) khuddaghaṇṭikā;
anya-e0809n:967_0: Aṅgulīyaka maṅgulyā, bharaṇaṃ, sākkharaṃ tu taṃ.
anya-e0809n:977_0: Cela macchādanaṃ vatthaṃ, vāso vasana maṃsukaṃ;
anya-e0809n:978_0: Ambarañca paṭo nitthī, dussaṃ colo ca sāṭako.
anya-e0809n:980_0: Khomaṃ dukūlaṃ koseyyaṃ, pattuṇṇaṃ kambalo ca vā;
anya-e0809n:981_0: Sāṇaṃ koṭamburaṃ bhaṅga, ntyādi vatthantaraṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:986_0: Uttarīya matho vattha, mahatanti mataṃ navaṃ;
anya-e0809n:987_0: Nantakaṃ kappaṭo jiṇṇa, vasanaṃ tu paṭaccaraṃ.
anya-e0809n:989_0: Kañcuko vāravāṇaṃ vā, tha vatthāvayave dasā;
anya-e0809n:995_0: Arahaddhajo ca kāsāya, kāsāvāni ca cīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:998_0: Phala,ttaca, kimi, romā, nyetā vatthassa yoniyo;
anya-e0809n:999_0: Phālaṃ kappāsikaṃ tīsu, khomādī tu tacabbhavā.
anya-e0809n:1001_0: Koseyyaṃ kimijaṃ, roma, mayaṃ tu kambalaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:1007_0: Visesako tu tilako, tyūbho nitthī ca cittakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1008_0: Candano nitthiyaṃ gandha, sāro malayajo pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1019_0: Yakkhadhūpo sajjulaso, takkolaṃ tu ca kolakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1020_0: Kosaphala matho jāti, kosaṃ jātiphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1023_0: Alattako yāvako ca, lākhā jatu napuṃsake.
anya-e0809n:1025_0: Sirivāso tu sarala, ddavo’ ñjanaṃ tu kajjalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1029_0: Mālā mālyaṃ pupphadāme pupphaṃ dāmaṃ (ka.), bhāvitaṃ vāsitaṃ tisu.
anya-e0809n:1032_0: Seyyā ca sayanaṃ senaṃ, pallaṅko tu ca mañcako.
anya-e0809n:1039_0: Bibbohanaṃ co’ padhānaṃ, pīṭhikā pīṭha māsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1040_0: Kocchaṃ tu bhaddapīṭhe thā, sandī pīṭhantare matā.
anya-e0809n:1046_0: Ghanapupphaṃ paṭalikā, setaṃ tu paṭikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1052_0: Kaṭṭissaṃ koseyyaṃ ratana, parisibbita mattharaṇaṃ kamā;
anya-e0809n:1055_0: Dīpo padīpo pajjoto, pume tvādāsa dappaṇā;
anya-e0809n:1056_0: Geṇḍuko kaṇḍuko tāla, vaṇṭaṃ tu bījanītthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1058_0: Caṅkoṭako karaṇḍo ca, samuggo sampuṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n:1061_0: Vivāho payamā pāṇi, ggaho pariṇayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1064_0: Khujjo ca gaṇḍulo rassa, vāmanā tu lakuṇḍako;
anya-e0809n:1069_0: Kuṇī hatthādivaṅko ca, valiro tu ca kekaro.
anya-e0809n:1079_0: Ātaṅko āmayo byādhi, gado rogo rujāpi ca;
anya-e0809n:1085_0: Ñeyyaṃ tva’ru vaṇo nitthī, phoṭo tu piḷakā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1087_0: Pubbo pūyo tha rattāti, sāro pakkhandikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1091_0: Kaṇḍū kaṇḍūti kaṇḍūyā, khajju kaṇḍūvanaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1093_0: Pāmaṃ vitacchikā kacchu, sotho tu sayathū’dito;
anya-e0809n:1097_0: Visūcikā iti mahā, vireko tha bhagandalo bhagandaro (ka.).
anya-e0809n:1099_0: Meho jaro kāsa sāsā, kuṭṭhaṃ sūlāmayantarā;
anya-e0809n:1100_0: Vutto vejjo bhisakko ca, rogahārī tikicchako.
anya-e0809n:1103_0: Bhesajja magado ceva, bhesajaṃ mo’sadhaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1111_0: Kulaṃ vaṃso ca santānā, bhijanā gotta manvayo;
anya-e0809n:1112_0: Thiyaṃ santatya tho vaṇṇā, cattāro khattiyādayo.
anya-e0809n:1116_0: Rājā bhūpati bhūpālo, patthivo ca narādhipo.
anya-e0809n:1124_0: Pume licchavi vajjī ca, sakyo tu sākiyo tha ca;
anya-e0809n:1125_0: Bhaddakaccānā bhaddā kaccānā (ṭī.) rāhula, mātā bimbā yasodharā.
anya-e0809n:1134_0: Vaḷañje ca gahapati, mahāsālā dhane siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:1137_0: Sajīvo sacivā, macco, senānī tu camūpati.
anya-e0809n:1143_0: Kañcukī sovidallo ca, anujīvī tu sevako.
anya-e0809n:1149_0: Amitto ripu verī ca, sapattā rāti satva’ri; (Sattu+ari)
anya-e0809n:1153_0: Viddesī ca diso diṭṭho,thā nurodho nuvattanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1155_0: Mitto nitthī vayasso ca, sahāyo suhajjo (ṭī.) suhado sakhā;
anya-e0809n:1159_0: Dūto tu sandesaharo, gaṇako tu muhuttiko.
anya-e0809n:1161_0: Lekhako lipikāro ca, vaṇṇo tu akkharo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1162_0: Bhedo daṇḍo sāma dānā, nyupāyā caturo ime.
anya-e0809n:1164_0: Upajāpotu bhedo ca, daṇḍo tu sāhasaṃ damo;
anya-e0809n:1166_0: Sāmya’ macco sakhā koso, duggañca vijitaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1169_0: Pabhāvu’ssāha, mantānaṃ, vasā tisso hi sattiyo;
anya-e0809n:1173_0: Manto ca mantanaṃ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
anya-e0809n:1174_0: Tigocaro tu chakkaṇṇo, rahassaṃ guyha muccate.
anya-e0809n:1176_0: Tīsu vivitta vijana, channā, raho raho byayaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1181_0: Āṇā ca sāsanaṃ ñeyyaṃ, uddānaṃ tu ca bandhanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1183_0: Āgu vutta mantu (ka.) maparādho, karo tu bali muccate;
anya-e0809n:1184_0: Puṇṇapatto tuṭṭhidāyo, upadā tu ca pābhataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1187_0: Suṅkaṃ tvanitthī gumbādi, deyye thā’yo dhanāgamo.
anya-e0809n:1189_0: Ātapattaṃ tathā chattaṃ, raññaṃ tu hemamāsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1190_0: Sīhāsanaṃ atho vāḷa, bījanītthī ca cāmaraṃ.
anya-e0809n:1192_0: Khaggo ca chatta muṇhīsaṃ, pādukā vālabījanī;
anya-e0809n:1198_0: Kuñjaro vāraṇo hatthī, mātaṅgo dvirado gajo;
anya-e0809n:1202_0: Kāḷāvaka gaṅgeyyā, paṇḍara tambā ca piṅgalo gandho;
anya-e0809n:1206_0: Kalabho ceva bhiṅkotha, pabhinno matta gajjitā;
anya-e0809n:1207_0: Hatthighaṭā tu gajatā, hatthīnī tu kareṇukā.
anya-e0809n:1218_0: Majjhamhi bandhanaṃ kacchā, kappano tu kuthādayo.
anya-e0809n:1220_0: Opavayho rājavayho, sajjito tu ca kappito;
anya-e0809n:1223_0: Tuttaṃ tu kaṇṇamūlamhi, matthakamhi tu aṅkuso;
anya-e0809n:1236_0: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅko tha, javano ca javādhiko;
anya-e0809n:1237_0: Mukhādhānaṃ khalīno vā, kasā tva ssābhitāḷinī.
anya-e0809n:1239_0: Kusā tu nāsarajjumhi, vaḷavā’ssā khuro saphaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1240_0: Puccha manitthī naṅguṭṭhaṃ, vālahattho ca vāladhi.
anya-e0809n:1242_0: Sandano ca ratho phussa, ratho tu naraṇāya so;
anya-e0809n:1246_0: Sivikā yāpyayānañcā, nitthī tu sakaṭo pya’naṃ (sakaṭo pi+anaṃ);
anya-e0809n:1247_0: Cakkaṃ rathaṅga mākhyātaṃ, tassanto nemi nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1249_0: Tammajjhe piṇḍikā nābhi, kubbaro tu yugandharo;
anya-e0809n:1252_0: Dhuro mukhe rathassaṅgā, tva kkho pakkharaādayo;
anya-e0809n:1255_0: Rathacārī tu sūto ca, pājitā ceva sārathī;
anya-e0809n:1259_0: Padāti pattī tu pume, padago padiko mato;
anya-e0809n:1260_0: Sannāho kaṅkaṭo vammaṃ, kavaco vā uracchado.
anya-e0809n:1262_0: Jālikā tha ca sannaddho, sajjo ca vammiko bhave;
anya-e0809n:1266_0: Javano turito vegī, jetabbaṃ jeyya muccate.
anya-e0809n:1268_0: Sūra vīrā tu vikkanto, sahāyo nucaro samā;
anya-e0809n:1269_0: Sannaddhappabhutī tīsu, pātheyyaṃ tu ca sambalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1271_0: Vāhinī dhajinī senā, camū cakkaṃ balaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:1283_0: Dhūlīkatesu senāya, yantiyā kkhobhanī akkhobhiṇī (ka.) tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1285_0: Sampatti sampadā lakkhī, sirī vipatti āpadā;
anya-e0809n:1286_0: Athā vudhañca āyudhantipi pāṭho heti’tthī, satthaṃ paharaṇaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1294_0: Issāso dhanu kodaṇḍaṃ, cāpo nitthī sarāsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1298_0: Vāṇo kaṇḍa musu dvīsu, khurappo urappo (ka.) tejanā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1299_0: Tūṇītthiyaṃ kalāpo ca, tūṇo tūṇīra vāṇadhi.
anya-e0809n:1301_0: Pakkho tu vājo diddho tu, visappito saro bhave;
anya-e0809n:1304_0: Maṇḍalaggo tu nettiṃso, asi khaggo ca sāyako;
anya-e0809n:1307_0: Kheṭakaṃ phalakaṃ cammaṃ, illī tu karapālikā;
anya-e0809n:1308_0: Churikā satya’siputtī, laguḷo tu ca muggaro.
anya-e0809n:1310_0: Sallo nitthi saṅku pume, vāsī tu tacchanītthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1313_0: Kaṇayo bhindivāḷo ca, cakkaṃ kunto gadā tathā;
anya-e0809n:1317_0: Niyyānaṃ gamanaṃ yātrā, paṭṭhānañca gamo gati;
anya-e0809n:1318_0: Cuṇṇo paṃsu rajo ceva, dhūlī’tthī reṇu ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n:1320_0: Māgadho madhuko vutto, vandī tu thutipāṭhako;
anya-e0809n:1324_0: Ketu dhajo paṭākā ca, kadalī ketanaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1327_0: Balaṃ thāmo sahaṃ satti, vikkamo tvatisūratā;
anya-e0809n:1328_0: Raṇe jitassa yaṃ pānaṃ, jayapānanti taṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1330_0: Saṅgāmo sampahāro cā, nitthiyaṃ samaraṃ raṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1333_0: Bhaṇḍanaṃ tu vivādo ca, viggaho kalaha medhagā;
anya-e0809n:1337_0: Uppādo uppāto (ka.)1027-gāthā passitabbā bhūtavikati, yā subhāsubhasūcikā;
anya-e0809n:1340_0: Nibbuddhaṃ niyuddhaṃ (ka.) mallayuddhamhi, jayo tu vijayo bhave;
anya-e0809n:1344_0: Hiṃsanaṃ saraṇaṃ hiṃsā, vadho sasana ghātanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1347_0: Nidhano nitthiyaṃ nāso, kālo’nto cavanaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1357_0: Kārā tu bandhanāgāraṃ, kāraṇā tu ca yātanā.
anya-e0809n:1360_0: Brahmabandhu dvijo vippo, brahmā bhovādī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0809n:1364_0: Brahmacārī gahaṭṭho ca, vanappattho ca bhikkhuti;
anya-e0809n:1368_0: Upajjhāyo upajjhā thā, cariyo nissayadādiko nissayadāyako (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n:1370_0: Upanīyā thavā pubbaṃ, veda majjhāpaye dvijo;
anya-e0809n:1371_0: Yo saṅgaṃ sarahassañcā, cariyo brāhmaṇesu so.
anya-e0809n:1374_0: Yāgo tu katu yañño tha, vedītthī bhū parikkhatā.
anya-e0809n:1376_0: Assamedho ca purisa, medho ceva niraggaḷo;
anya-e0809n:1377_0: Sammāpāso vājapeyya, miti yāgā mahā ime.
anya-e0809n:1381_0: Parisā sabhā samajjā ca, tathā samiti saṃsado.
anya-e0809n:1383_0: Catasso parisā bhikkhu, bhikkhunī ca upāsakā;
anya-e0809n:1384_0: Upāsikāyoti imā, thavā ṭṭha parisā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:1390_0: Vedāna mādibhūtaṃ sā, sāvittī tipadaṃ siyā.
anya-e0809n:1392_0: Habyapāke caru mato, sujā tu homadabbiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1393_0: Paramannaṃ tu pāyāso, habyaṃ tu havi kathyate.
anya-e0809n:1395_0: Yūpo thūṇāyaṃ nimmantya, dārumhi tva’raṇī dvisu;
anya-e0809n:1401_0: Pañca mahāpariccāgo, vutto seṭṭha, dhanassa ca;
anya-e0809n:1402_0: Vasena putta dārānaṃ, rajjassa’ ṅgāna meva ca.
anya-e0809n:1404_0: Annaṃ pānaṃ gharaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ mālā vilepanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1405_0: Gandho seyyā padīpeyyaṃ, dānavatthū siyuṃ dasa.
anya-e0809n:1408_0: Pitudānaṃ tu nivāpo, saddhaṃ tu taṃva sātthato.
anya-e0809n:1410_0: Pume atithi āgantu, pāhunā vesikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1411_0: Aññattha gantu micchanto, gamiko thā ggha magghiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1422_0: Upāsanaṃ tu sussūsā, sā pāricariyā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1424_0: Mona mabhāsanaṃ tuṇhī, bhāvo tha paṭipāṭi sā;
anya-e0809n:1427_0: Tapo ca saṃyamo sīlaṃ, niyamo tu vatañca vā;
anya-e0809n:1433_0: Yo pāpehi upāvatto, vāso saddhiṃ guṇehi so;
anya-e0809n:1437_0: Vācaṃyamo tu muni ca, tāpaso tu isī rito.
anya-e0809n:1446_0: Aññā tu arahattañca, thūpo tu cetiyaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:1447_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko ca, ānando dve samā tha ca.
anya-e0809n:1451_0: Bhikkhupi sāmaṇero ca, sikkhamānā ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0809n:1454_0: Patto ticīvaraṃ kāya, bandhanaṃ vāsi sūci ca;
anya-e0809n:1457_0: Sāmaṇero ca samaṇu, ddeso cātha digambaro;
anya-e0809n:1458_0: Aceḷako nigaṇṭho ca, jaṭilo tu jaṭādharo.
anya-e0809n:1463_0: Pavitto payato pūto, cammaṃ tu ajinaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1473_0: Vesso ca vesiyāno tha, jīvanaṃ vutti jīvikā;
anya-e0809n:1479_0: Khettājīvo kassako tha, khettaṃ kedāra muccate;
anya-e0809n:1482_0: Dāttaṃ lavitta masitaṃ “asita” saddo puṃnapuṃsake-1005-gāthā passitabbā, patodo tutta pājanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1483_0: Yottaṃ tu rajju rasmitthī, phālo tu kasako bhave.
anya-e0809n:1486_0: Sammā tu yugakīlasmiṃ, sītā tu halapaddhati.
anya-e0809n:1489_0: Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
anya-e0809n:1490_0: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā.
anya-e0809n:1495_0: Atha kaṅgu piyaṅgu’tthī, ummā tu atasī bhave;
anya-e0809n:1496_0: Kiṭṭhañca sassaṃ dhaññañca viññeyyaṃ (ṭī.), vīhi thambakarī thambhakarī (ka.) rito.
anya-e0809n:1498_0: Kaṇḍo tu nāḷa matha so, palālaṃ nitthi nipphalo;
anya-e0809n:1499_0: Bhusaṃ kaliṅgaro cātha, thuso dhaññattace tha ca.
anya-e0809n:1503_0: Khalo ca dhaññakaraṇaṃ, thambo thambho (ka.) gumbo tiṇādinaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1505_0: Ayoggo musalo nitthī, kullo suppa manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1506_0: Atho’ddhanañca culli’tthī, kilañjo tu kaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n:1509_0: Kolambo cātha maṇikaṃ, bhāṇako ca arañjaro.
anya-e0809n:1511_0: Ghaṭo dvīsu kuṭo nitthī, kumbho kalasa, vārakā;
anya-e0809n:1512_0: Kaṃso bhuñjanapatto thā, mattaṃ patto ca bhājanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1514_0: Aṇḍupakaṃ cumbaṭakaṃ, sarāvo tu ca mallako;
anya-e0809n:1518_0: Mahosadhaṃ tu taṃ sukkhaṃ, maricaṃ tu ca kolakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1521_0: Dhaññambilaṃ biḷaṅgo tha, lavaṇaṃ loṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n:1523_0: Sāmuddaṃ sindhavo nitthī, kāḷaloṇaṃ tu ubbhidaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1524_0: Biḷakaṃ biḷāla (ka.) ceti pañcete, pabhedā lavaṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n:1526_0: Guḷo ca phāṇitaṃ khaṇḍo, macchaṇḍī sakkharā iti;
anya-e0809n:1529_0: Lājā siyā’kkhataṃ cātha, dhānā bhaṭṭhayave bhave;
anya-e0809n:1530_0: Abaddhasattu mantho ca, pūpā’ pūpā tu piṭṭhako.
anya-e0809n:1533_0: Odaniko ca rasako, sūpo tu byañjanaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1535_0: Odano vā kuraṃ bhattaṃ, bhikkhā cā’nna mathā sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1539_0: Khajjaṃ tu bhojja leyyāni, peyyanti catudhā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1544_0: Vighāsādo ca damako, pipāsā tu ca tassanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1547_0: Udreko ceva uggāro, sohiccaṃ titti tappanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1554_0: Uttamaṇṇo ca dhaniko, dhamaṇṇo tu iṇāyiko.
anya-e0809n:1556_0: Uddhāro tu iṇaṃ vuttaṃ, mūlaṃ tu pābhataṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:1562_0: Saṅkhyāne tu ca saṅkhyeyye, ekatte vīsatādayo;
anya-e0809n:1565_0: Sataṃ sahassaṃ niyutaṃ nahutaṃ-nayutaṃ (katthaci), lakkhaṃ koṭi pakoṭiyo;
anya-e0809n:1569_0: Ahahaṃ ababaṃ cevā, ṭaṭaṃ sogandhi kuppalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1580_0: Tulā, pattha, ṅguli, vasā, tidhā māna matho siyā.
anya-e0809n:1584_0: Dve akkhā māsakā pañca, kkhānaṃ dharaṇamaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1586_0: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṃ, nikkhaṃ tvanitthi pañca te;
anya-e0809n:1587_0: Pādo bhāge catutthe tha, dharaṇāni palaṃ dasa.
anya-e0809n:1589_0: Tulā palasataṃ cātha, bhāro vīsati tā tulā;
anya-e0809n:1600_0: Āḷhako nitthiyaṃ tumbho, patthotu nāḷi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1606_0: Dabbaṃ vittaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, vasva’ttho vibhavo bhave.
anya-e0809n:1608_0: Koso hiraññañca katā, kataṃ kañcana, rūpiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1609_0: Kuppaṃ tadaññaṃ tambādi, rūpiyaṃ dvaya māhataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1611_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanakaṃ jāta, rūpaṃ soṇṇañca kañcanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1612_0: Satthuvaṇṇo harī kambu, cāru hemañca hāṭakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1614_0: Tapaniyaṃ hiraññaṃ ta, bbhedā cāmīkarampi ca;
anya-e0809n:1615_0: Sātakumbhaṃ tathā jambu, nadaṃ siṅgī ca nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1617_0: Rūpiyaṃ rajataṃ sajjhu, rūpī sajjhaṃ atho vasu;
anya-e0809n:1620_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ muttā, maṇi veḷuriyāni ca;
anya-e0809n:1623_0: Lohitaṅko ca paduma, rāgo rattamaṇi pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1624_0: Vaṃsavaṇṇo veḷuriyaṃ, pavāḷaṃ vā ca viddumo.
anya-e0809n:1626_0: Masāragallaṃ kabaramaṇi, atha muttā ca muttikaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1627_0: Rīti rīrī (ṭī.) tthī ārakūṭo vā, amalaṃ tva’bbhakaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1631_0: Kāḷatipu tu sīsañca, haritālaṃ tu pītanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1633_0: Cinapiṭṭhañca sindūraṃ, atha tūlo tathā picu;
anya-e0809n:1634_0: Khuddajaṃ tu madhu khuddaṃ, madhucchiṭṭhaṃ tu sitthakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1638_0: Usabho balībaddho balibadda (ka.) ca, goṇo govasabho vuso.
anya-e0809n:1640_0: Vuddho jaraggavo so tha, dammo vacchataro samā;
anya-e0809n:1641_0: Dhuravāhī tu dhorayho, govindo dhikato gavaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1643_0: Vaho ca khandhadeso tha, kakudho kakudo (ka.) kaku vuccate;
anya-e0809n:1644_0: Atho visāṇaṃ siṅgañca, rattagāvī tu rohiṇī.
anya-e0809n:1646_0: Gāvī ca siṅginī go ca, vañjhā tu kathyate vasā;
anya-e0809n:1650_0: Gomiḷho gomayo nitthī, atho sappi ghataṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1652_0: Navuddhaṭaṃ tu nonītaṃ, damimaṇḍaṃ tu matthu ca,
anya-e0809n:1653_0: Khīraṃ duddhaṃ payo thaññaṃ, takkaṃ tu mathitaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1655_0: Khīraṃ dadhi ghataṃ takkaṃ, nonītaṃ pañca gorasā;
anya-e0809n:1656_0: Urabbho meṇḍa mesā ca, uraṇo avi eḷako.
anya-e0809n:1660_0: Gadrabho tu kharo vutto, uraṇī tu ajī ajā.
anya-e0809n:1669_0: Tacchako tantavāyo ca, rajako ca nahāpito;
anya-e0809n:1673_0: Rathakāro tha suvaṇṇa, kāro nāḷindhamo bhave.
anya-e0809n:1683_0: Veno vilīvakāro ca, naḷakāro samā tayo;
anya-e0809n:1694_0: Māyā tu sambarī māyā, kāro tu indajāliko;
anya-e0809n:1696_0: Orabbhikā sūkarikā, māgavikā te ca sākuṇikā;
anya-e0809n:1697_0: Hantvā jīvante’ḷaka, sūkara, miga, pakkhino kamato.
anya-e0809n:1701_0: Vetaniko tu bhatako, kammakaro tha kiṃ karo;
anya-e0809n:1702_0: Dāso ca ceṭako pesso, bhacco ca paricāriko.
anya-e0809n:1705_0: Dāsā karamarānīto, ccevaṃ te catudhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:1712_0: Sapāko ceva caṇḍālo, mātaṅgo sapaco bhave;
anya-e0809n:1717_0: Sārameyyo ca sunakho, suno soṇo ca kukkuro.
anya-e0809n:1723_0: Sābandhanaṃ tu gaddūlo, dīpako tu ca cetako;
anya-e0809n:1724_0: Bandhanaṃ gaṇṭhi pāso tha, vāgurā vākarā migabandhanī.
anya-e0809n:1726_0: Thiyaṃ kuveṇī kumīnaṃ, ānayo jāla muccate;
anya-e0809n:1734_0: Suttaṃ tantu pume tantaṃ, potthaṃ lepyādikammani;
anya-e0809n:1738_0: Mañjūsā peḷā piṭako, tvitthiyaṃ pacchi peṭako.
anya-e0809n:1741_0: Upāhano vā pādu’tthī, tabbhedā pādukā pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1748_0: Tabbhastā gaggarī nārī, sattaṃ tu pipphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1752_0: Kharo ca kakaco nitthī, sippaṃ kammaṃ kalādikaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1759_0: Opamma mupamānaṃ cu, pamā bhati tu nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1761_0: Nibbeso vetanaṃ mūlyaṃ, jūtaṃ tvanitthi ketavaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1764_0: Pāṭibhogotu paṭibhū, akkho tu pāsako bhave;
anya-e0809n:1765_0: Pumevā’ ṭṭhapadaṃ aṭṭhāpadaṃ sāri, phalake tha paṇo, bbhuto.
anya-e0809n:1767_0: Kiṇṇaṃ tu madirābīje, madhu madhvāsave mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:1768_0: Madirā vāruṇī majjaṃ, surā bhavo tu merayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1778_0: Araññaṃ kānanaṃ dāyo, gahanaṃ vipinaṃ vanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1782_0: Tarusaṇḍo sa ārāmo, tatho pavana muccate.
anya-e0809n:1787_0: Panti vīthyā’vali seṇī, pāḷi lekhā tu rāji ca;
anya-e0809n:1788_0: Pādapo viṭapī rukkho, ago sālo mahīruho.
anya-e0809n:1790_0: Dumo taru kujo sākhī, gaccho tu khuddapādapo;
anya-e0809n:1791_0: Phalanti ye vinā pupphaṃ, te vuccanti vanappatī.
anya-e0809n:1795_0: Tīsu vañcyā’phalā cātha, phalino phalavā phalī.
anya-e0809n:1797_0: Samphullito tu vikaco, phullo vikasito tisu;
anya-e0809n:1798_0: Siro’ggaṃ sikharo nitthī, sākhā tu kathitā latā.
anya-e0809n:1800_0: Dalaṃ palāsaṃ chadanaṃ, paṇṇaṃ pattaṃ chado pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1801_0: Pallavo vā kisalayaṃ, navubbhinne tu aṅkuro.
anya-e0809n:1803_0: Makulaṃ vā kuṭumalo, khārako tu ca jālakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1806_0: Pasavo kusumaṃ pupphaṃ, parāgo pupphajo rajo;
anya-e0809n:1807_0: Makarando madhu mataṃ, thavako tu ca gocchako.
anya-e0809n:1813_0: Mallikādī tu kusume, saliṅgā vīhayo phale;
anya-e0809n:1816_0: Mūla mārabbha sākhanto, khandho bhāgo tarussa tha;
anya-e0809n:1817_0: Koṭaro nitthiyaṃ rukkha, cchidde kaṭṭhaṃ tu dāru ca.
anya-e0809n:1819_0: Bundo mūlañca pādo tha, saṅku’tto khāṇunitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1820_0: Karahāṭaṃ tu kando tha, kaḷīro matthako bhave.
anya-e0809n:1822_0: Vallarī mañjarī nārī, vallī tu kathitā latā;
anya-e0809n:1823_0: Thambho gumbo ca akkhandhe, latā virū patāninī.
anya-e0809n:1825_0: Assattho bodhi ca dvīsu, nigrodho tu vaṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n:1826_0: Kabiṭṭho ca kapittho ca, yaññaṅgo tu udumbaro.
anya-e0809n:1831_0: Dantasaṭho ca jambhīro, varaṇo tu kareri ca;
anya-e0809n:1832_0: Kiṃ suko pālibhaddotha, vañjulo tu ca vetaso.
anya-e0809n:1835_0: Atho guḷaphalo pīlu, sobhañjano ca siggu ca.
anya-e0809n:1841_0: Mālūra beluvābillo, punnāgo tu ca kesaro;
anya-e0809n:1842_0: Sālavo tu ca loddo tha, piyālo sannakaddu ca.
anya-e0809n:1849_0: Puṇḍarīko ca setambo, selu tu bahuvārako;
anya-e0809n:1850_0: Sepaṇṇī kāsmirī cātha, kolī ca badarītthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1858_0: Kadambo piyako nīpo, bhallī bhallātako tisu;
anya-e0809n:1859_0: Jhāvuko piculo cātha, tilako khurako bhave.
anya-e0809n:1861_0: Ciñcā ca tintiṇī cātha, gaddabhaṇḍo kapītano;
anya-e0809n:1865_0: Niculo mucalindo ca, nīpo tha piyako tathā;
anya-e0809n:1870_0: Yūpo pūgo (ka.) tu kamuko cātha, paṭṭi lākhāpasādano.
anya-e0809n:1875_0: Pakiriyo pūtiko tha, rohī rohitako bhave;
anya-e0809n:1876_0: Eraṇḍo tu ca āmaṇḍo, atha sattuphalā samī.
anya-e0809n:1879_0: Somavakko tu kadaro, sallotu madano bhave.
anya-e0809n:1881_0: Athāpi indasālo ca, sallakī khārako siyā;
anya-e0809n:1882_0: Devadāru bhaddadāru, campeyyo tu ca campako.
anya-e0809n:1888_0: Nimbo’riṭṭho pucimando, karako tu ca dāḷimo.
anya-e0809n:1890_0: Saralo pūtikaṭṭhañca, kapilā tu ca siṃsapā;
anya-e0809n:1891_0: Sāmā piyaṅgu kaṅgupi, sirīso tu ca bhaṇḍilo.
anya-e0809n:1898_0: Tāpiñcho ca tamālo tha, kuṭajo girimallikā.
anya-e0809n:1900_0: Indayavo phale tassā, ggimantho kaṇikā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1901_0: Niguṇṭhi’tthī sinduvāro, tiṇasuññaṃ tiṇasūlaṃ (ṭī.) tu mallikā.
anya-e0809n:1910_0: Mātuluṅgo bījapūro, ummatto tu ca mātulo.
anya-e0809n:1912_0: Karamando suseno ca, kundaṃ tu māghya muccate;
anya-e0809n:1920_0: Japā tu jayasumanaṃ, karīro kakaco bhave;
anya-e0809n:1925_0: Pūtilatā gaḷocī ca, mubbā madhurasā pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1927_0: Kapikacchu duphasso tha, mañjiṭṭhā vikasā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1928_0: Ambaṭṭhā ca tathā pāṭhā, kaṭukā kaṭurohiṇī.
anya-e0809n:1936_0: Nididdhikā tu byagghī ca, atha nīlī ca nīlinī;
anya-e0809n:1937_0: Jiñjuko jiñjukā (ka.) ceva guñjā tha, satamūlī satāvarī.
anya-e0809n:1942_0: Nuhī ceva mahānāmo, muddikā tu madhurasā;
anya-e0809n:1945_0: Vātiṅgaṇo ca bhaṇḍākī, vāttākī brahatī pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1946_0: Nāgabalā ceva jhasā, lāṅgalī tu ca sāradī.
anya-e0809n:1948_0: Rambhā ca kadalī moco, kappāsī badarā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1949_0: Nāgalatā tu tambūlī, aggijālā tu dhātakī.
anya-e0809n:1951_0: Tivutā tipuṭā cātha, sāmā kāḷā ca kathyate;
anya-e0809n:1952_0: Atho siṅgī ca usabho, reṇukā kapiḷā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1955_0: Seleyya’ masmapupphañca, elā tu bahulā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1957_0: Kuṭṭhañca byādhi kathito, vāneyyaṃ tu kuṭannaṭaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1960_0: Mūlaṃ pattaṃ kaḷīra’ggaṃ, kandaṃ miñjā phalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:1961_0: Taco pupphañca chattanti, sākaṃ dasavidhaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1965_0: Jīvanti jīvanī cātha, madhurako ca jīvako.
anya-e0809n:1967_0: Mahākando ca lasuṇaṃ, palaṇḍu tu sukandako;
anya-e0809n:1968_0: Paṭolo tittako cātha, bhiṅgarājo ca makkavo.
anya-e0809n:1971_0: Kāravello tu susavī, tumbyā’lābu ca lābu sā.
anya-e0809n:1973_0: Eḷālukañca kakkārī, kumbhaṇḍo tu ca vallibho;
anya-e0809n:1976_0: Mūlako nitthiyaṃ cuccu, tambako ca kalambako;
anya-e0809n:1979_0: Saddalo ceva dubbā ca, golomī sā sitā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1980_0: Gundā ca bhaddamuttañca, rasālo tu’cchu veḷu tu.
anya-e0809n:1982_0: Tacasāro veṇu vaṃso, pabbaṃ tu phalu gaṇṭhiso;
anya-e0809n:1983_0: Kīcakā te siyuṃ veṇū, ye nadantyā’niladdhutā.
anya-e0809n:1985_0: Naḷo ca dhamano poṭa, galo tu kāsa mitthi na;
anya-e0809n:1986_0: Tejano tu saro, mūlaṃ, tū’ sīraṃ bīraṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n:1988_0: Kuso varahisaṃ dabbo, bhūtiṇakaṃ tu bhūtiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1992_0: Tālo vibhedikā cātha, khajjurī sindi vuccati;
anya-e0809n:1994_0: Hintāla, tāla, khajjūrī, nālikerā tatheva ca;
anya-e0809n:1995_0: Tālī ca ketakī nārī, pūgo ca tiṇapādapāti.
anya-e0809n:2003_0: Viñjho paṇḍava vaṅkādī, pubbaselo tu co’dayo;
anya-e0809n:2007_0: Kālakūṭo tikūṭā’ssa, pattho tu sānu nitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2009_0: Kūṭo vā sikharaṃ siṅgaṃ, papāto tu taṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n:2012_0: Darī’tthī kandaro dvīsu, leṇaṃ tu gabbharaṃ guhā;
anya-e0809n:2013_0: Silāpokkharaṇī soṇḍī, kuñjaṃ nikuñja mitthi na.
anya-e0809n:2015_0: Uddha madhiccakā sela, ssāsannā bhūmyu paccakā;
anya-e0809n:2020_0: Migindo kesarī sīho, taraccho tu migādano;
anya-e0809n:2021_0: Byaggho tu puṇḍarīko tha, saddūlo dīpinī’rito.
anya-e0809n:2028_0: Khagga khaggavisāṇā tu, palāsādo ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n:2031_0: Makkaṭo vānaro sākhā, migo kapi valīmukho;
anya-e0809n:2035_0: Siṅgālo sigālo (sī.) jambuko kotthu, bheravo ca sivā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2036_0: Biḷāro babbu mañjāro, koko tu ca vako bhave.
anya-e0809n:2043_0: Hariṇo miga sāraṅgā, mago ajinayoni ca;
anya-e0809n:2047_0: Eṇeyyo eṇīmigo ca, pampaṭako tu pampako;
anya-e0809n:2048_0: Vātamigo tu calanī, mūsiko tvā’khu unduro.
anya-e0809n:2051_0: Ruru raṅku ca nīko ca, sarabhādī migantarā.
anya-e0809n:2054_0: Migā tu pasavo sīhā, dayo sabbacatuppadā.
anya-e0809n:2056_0: Lūtā tu lūtikā uṇṇa, nābhi makkaṭako siyā;
anya-e0809n:2059_0: Godhā kuṇḍo pyatho kaṇṇa, jalūkā satapadyatha;
anya-e0809n:2060_0: Kalandako kāḷakā tha, nakulo maṅguso bhave.
anya-e0809n:2062_0: Kakaṇṭako ca saraṭo, kīṭo tu puḷavo kimi;
anya-e0809n:2067_0: Sakuṇo ca sakunto vi, pataṅgo sakuṇī dvijo.
anya-e0809n:2069_0: Vakkaṅgo pattayāno ca, patanto nīḷajo bhave;
anya-e0809n:2070_0: Tabbhedā vaṭṭakā jīva, ñjīvo cakora tittirā.
anya-e0809n:2075_0: Patattaṃ pekhuṇaṃ pattaṃ, pakkho piñchaṃ chado garu;
anya-e0809n:2076_0: Aṇḍaṃ tu pakkhibīje tha, nīḷo nitthī kulāvakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2079_0: Yugaṃ tu yugalaṃ dvandaṃ, yamakaṃ yamalaṃ yamaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2081_0: Samūho gaṇa saṅghātā, samudāyo ca sañcayo;
anya-e0809n:2082_0: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo.
anya-e0809n:2084_0: Kāyo khandho samudayo, ghaṭā samiti saṃhati;
anya-e0809n:2085_0: Rāsi puñjo samavāyo, pūgo jātaṃ kadambakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2087_0: Byūho vitāna gumbā ca, kalāpo jāla maṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2091_0: Sajātikānaṃ tu kulaṃ, nikāyo tu sadhamminaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2098_0: Kalāpī ca sikhī kekī, cūḷā tu ca sikhā bhave.
anya-e0809n:2101_0: Candako mecako cātha, chappado ca madhubbato.
anya-e0809n:2104_0: Pārāvato kapoto ca, kakuṭo ca pārevato.
anya-e0809n:2106_0: Gijjho gaddhotha kulalo, seno byagghīnaso pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2109_0: Uhuṅkāro ulūko ca, kosiyo vāyasāri ca;
anya-e0809n:2110_0: Kāko tva’riṭṭho dhaṅko ca, balipuṭṭho ca vāyaso.
anya-e0809n:2117_0: Suvo tu kīro ca suko, tambacūḷo tu kukkuṭo.
anya-e0809n:2119_0: Vanakukkuṭo ca nijjivho, atha koñcā ca kuntanī;
anya-e0809n:2120_0: Cakkavāko tu cakkavho, sāraṅgotu ca cātako.
anya-e0809n:2127_0: Lohapiṭṭho tathā kaṅko, khañjarīṭo tu khañjano;
anya-e0809n:2128_0: Kalaviṅko tu cāṭako, dindibho tu kikī bhave.
anya-e0809n:2137_0: Sūcimukho ca makaso, cīrī tu jhallikā jhillikā (ka.) tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2138_0: Jatukā jinapattā tha, haṃso setacchado bhave.
anya-e0809n:2147_0: Randhaṃ tu vivaraṃ chiddaṃ, kuharaṃ susiraṃ bilaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2149_0: Susi’tthī chiggalaṃ sobbhaṃ, sacchidde susiraṃ tisu;
anya-e0809n:2150_0: Thiyaṃ tu kāsu āvāṭo, sapparājā tu vāsukī.
anya-e0809n:2157_0: Silutto gharasappo tha, nīlasappo silābhu ca.
anya-e0809n:2160_0: Sarīsapo phaṇī sappā, lagaddā bhogi pannagā.
anya-e0809n:2162_0: Dvijivho urago vāḷo, dīgho ca dīghapiṭṭhiko;
anya-e0809n:2163_0: Pādūdaro visadharo, bhogo tu phaṇino tanu.
anya-e0809n:2165_0: Āsī’tthī sappadāṭhā tha, nimmoko kañcuko samā;
anya-e0809n:2166_0: Visaṃ tva’nitthī garaḷaṃ, tabbhedā vā halāhalo.
anya-e0809n:2170_0: Nirayo duggati’tthī ca, narako, so mahā’ṭṭhadhā;
anya-e0809n:2174_0: Thiyaṃ vetaraṇī loha, kumbhī tattha jalāsayā;
anya-e0809n:2183_0: Thevo tu bindu phusitaṃ, bhamo tu jalaniggamo.
anya-e0809n:2185_0: Āpo payo jalaṃ vāri, pānīyaṃ salilaṃ dakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2186_0: Aṇṇo nīraṃ vanaṃ vālaṃ, toyaṃ ambu’dakañca kaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2188_0: Taraṅgo ca tathā bhaṅgo, ūmi vīci pumitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2189_0: Ullolo tu ca kallolo, mahāvīcīsu kathyate.
anya-e0809n:2191_0: Jambālo kalalaṃ paṅko, cikkhallaṃ kaddamo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2192_0: Pulinaṃ vālukā vaṇṇu, marū’ru sikatā bhave.
anya-e0809n:2195_0: Tīraṃ tu kūlaṃ rodhañca, patīrañca taṭaṃ tisu.
anya-e0809n:2197_0: Pāraṃ paramhi tīramhi, oraṃ tva’pāra muccate;
anya-e0809n:2198_0: Uḷumpo uḷupo (ka.) tu plavo kullo, taro ca paccarī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2200_0: Taraṇī tari nāvā ca, kūpako tu ca kumbhakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2208_0: Poto pavahanaṃ vuttaṃ, doṇi tvi’tthī tathā’mbaṇaṃ ammaṇaṃ (sī.).
anya-e0809n:2210_0: Gabhīra ninna gambhīrā, tho ttānaṃ tabbipakkhake;
anya-e0809n:2214_0: Dhīvaro macchiko maccha, bandha kevaṭṭa jālikā.
anya-e0809n:2217_0: Rohito magguro siṅgī, balajo muñja pāvusā.
anya-e0809n:2219_0: Sattavaṅko savaṅko ca, naḷamīno ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n:2225_0: Pāsāṇamaccho pāṭhīno, vaṅko tu baḷiso bhave;
anya-e0809n:2229_0: Kakkaṭako kuḷīro ca, jalūkā tu ca rattapā;
anya-e0809n:2233_0: Atha sippī ca sutti’tthī, saṅkhe tu kambu’nitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2236_0: Jalāsayo jalādhāro, gambhīro rahado tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2239_0: Taḷāko ca saro’nitthī, vāpī ca sarasī’tthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2242_0: Anotatto tathā kaṇṇa, muṇḍo ca rathakārako;
anya-e0809n:2243_0: Chaddanto ca kuṇālo ca, vuttā mandākinī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2246_0: Āhāvo tu nipānañcā, khātaṃ tu devakhātakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2248_0: Savantī ninnagā sindhu, saritā āpagā nadī;
anya-e0809n:2249_0: Bhāgīrathī tu gaṅgā tha, sambhedo sindhusaṅgamo.
anya-e0809n:2251_0: Gaṅgā’ciravatī ceva, yamunā sarabhū (sarabū sarayū (ka.) ) mahī;
anya-e0809n:2252_0: Imā mahānadī pañca, candabhāgā sarassatī sarasvatī.
anya-e0809n:2254_0: Nerañjarā ca kāverī, nammadādī ca ninnagā;
anya-e0809n:2255_0: Vārimaggo paṇālī’tthī panāḷī (ṭī.), pume candanikā tu ca.
anya-e0809n:2260_0: Anitthī padumaṃ paṅke, ruhaṃ nalina pokkharaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2264_0: Kiñjakkho kesaro nitthī, daṇḍo tu nāla muccate.
anya-e0809n:2266_0: Bhisaṃ muḷālo nitthī ca, bījakoso tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n:2281_0: Sā’ṅgo’pāṅgehi kathyante, kaṇḍe vaggā iha kkamā.
anya-e0809n:2286_0: Sobhanaṃ ruciraṃ sādhu, manuññaṃ cāru sundaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:2287_0: Vaggu manoramaṃ kantaṃ, hārī mañju ca pesalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2289_0: Bhaddaṃ vāmañca kalyāṇaṃ, manāpaṃ laddhakaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2292_0: Mukhyo padhānaṃ pāmokkho, para maggañña muttaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:2293_0: Paṇītaṃ paramaṃ seyyo, gāmaṇī seṭṭha sattamā.
anya-e0809n:2296_0: Sīha kuñjara saddūlā, dī tu samāsagā pume.
anya-e0809n:2299_0: Iṭṭhaṃ tu subhagaṃ hajjaṃ, dayitaṃ vallabhaṃ piyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2301_0: Tucchañca rittakaṃ suññaṃ, athā’sārañca pheggu ca;
anya-e0809n:2302_0: Mejjhaṃ pūtaṃ pavitto tha, aviraddho apaṇṇako.
anya-e0809n:2304_0: Ukkaṭṭho ca pakaṭṭho tha, nihīno hīna lāmakā;
anya-e0809n:2309_0: Brahā mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, visālaṃ puthulaṃ puthu.
anya-e0809n:2311_0: Garu’ru vitthiṇṇa matho, pīnaṃ thūlañca pīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:2312_0: Thullañca vaṭharañcā tha, ācitaṃ nicitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:2314_0: Sabbaṃ samatta makhilaṃ, nikhilaṃ sakalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:2317_0: Bhūri pahutaṃ pacuraṃ, bhiyyo sambahulaṃ bahu;
anya-e0809n:2320_0: Parosatādī te, yesaṃ, paraṃ mattaṃ satādito;
anya-e0809n:2321_0: Parittaṃ sukhumaṃ khuddaṃ, thoka mappaṃ kisaṃ tanu.
anya-e0809n:2328_0: Sakāsaṃ antikaṃ ñattaṃ, dūraṃ tu vippakaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2330_0: Nirantaraṃ ghanaṃ sandaṃ, viraḷaṃ pelavaṃ tanu;
anya-e0809n:2331_0: Athā yataṃ dīgha matho, nittalaṃ vaṭṭa vaṭṭulaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2333_0: Ucco tu unnato tuṅgo, udaggo ceva ucchito;
anya-e0809n:2334_0: Nīco rasso vāmano tha, ajimho paguṇo uju.
anya-e0809n:2336_0: Aḷāraṃ vellitaṃ vaṅkaṃ, kuṭilaṃ jimha kuñcitaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2337_0: Dhuvo ca sassato nicco, sadātana sanantanā.
anya-e0809n:2340_0: Lahu sallahukaṃ cātha, saṅkhyātaṃ gaṇitaṃ mitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2342_0: Tiṇhaṃ tu tikhiṇaṃ tibbaṃ, caṇḍaṃ uggaṃ kharaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:2346_0: Thāvaro jaṅgamā añño, lolaṃ tu cañcalaṃ calaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2351_0: Kurūraṃ kaṭhinaṃ daḷhaṃ, niṭṭhuraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:2354_0: Jighaññaṃ carimaṃ pubbaṃ, tva’ggaṃ paṭhama mādi so;
anya-e0809n:2357_0: Byattaṃ puṭa phuṭaṃ (sī.) ñca mudu tu, sukumārañca komalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2360_0: Itarā’ññataro eko, añño bahuvidho tu ca;
anya-e0809n:2361_0: Nānārūpo ca vividho, abādhaṃ tu niraggalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2363_0: Athe’kākī ca ekacco, eko ca ekako samā;
anya-e0809n:2364_0: Sādhāraṇañca sāmaññaṃ, sambādho tu ca saṃkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2366_0: Vāmaṃ kaḷevaraṃ sabyaṃ; Apasabyaṃ tu dakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2372_0: Nipuṇo ca paṭu cheko, cāturo dakkha pesalā;
anya-e0809n:2373_0: Bālo dattu jalo mūḷho, mando viññū ca bāliso.
anya-e0809n:2376_0: Mahātaṇho mahiccho tha, hadayī hadayālu ca.
anya-e0809n:2378_0: Sumano haṭṭhacitto tha, dummano vimano pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2383_0: Vissuto vidito ceva, pasiddho pākaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n:2389_0: Dānāraho dakkhiṇeyyo, siniddho tu ca vacchalo;
anya-e0809n:2393_0: Kāruṇiko dayālupi, sūrato ussuko tu ca;
anya-e0809n:2396_0: Parādhīno parāyatto, āyatto tu ca santako;
anya-e0809n:2397_0: Pariggaho adhīno ca, sacchando tu ca serini.
anya-e0809n:2403_0: Kāmayitā tu kamitā, kāmano kāmi kāmuko;
anya-e0809n:2413_0: Sahano khamano khantā, titikkhavā ca khantimā.
anya-e0809n:2415_0: Saddhāyutto tu saddhālu, dhajavā tu dhajālu ca lajjālutu ca lajjavā (ka.);
anya-e0809n:2416_0: Niddālu niddāsīlo tha, bhassaro bhāsuro bhave.
anya-e0809n:2418_0: Naggo digambaro’vattho, ghasmaro tu ca bhakkhako;
anya-e0809n:2419_0: Eḷamūgo tu vattuñca, sotuṃ cā’kusalo bhave.
anya-e0809n:2422_0: Vācālo bahugārayha, vace vattā tu so vado.
anya-e0809n:2429_0: Sīsacchejjamhi vajjho tha, nikato ca saṭho’nuju;
anya-e0809n:2433_0: Anisamma hi yo kiccaṃ, puriso vadhabandhanādi mācarati;
anya-e0809n:2436_0: Khuddo kadariyo thaddha, maccharī kapaṇo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2437_0: Akiñcano daliddo ca, dīno niddhana duggatā.
anya-e0809n:2440_0: Atha yācanako atthī, yācako ca vanibbako.
anya-e0809n:2448_0: Rādhito sādhito cātha, nippakkaṃ kuthitaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:2451_0: Nuṇṇo nuttā’tta, khittā ce’, ritā viddhā tha kampito;
anya-e0809n:2452_0: Dhūto ādhūta calitā, nisitaṃ tu ca tejitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2454_0: Pattabbaṃ gamma māpajjaṃ āsajjaṃ (ka.), pakkaṃ pariṇataṃ samā;
anya-e0809n:2455_0: Veṭhitaṃ tu valayitaṃ, ruddhaṃ saṃvuta māvutaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2461_0: Lajjito hīḷito cātha, sanitaṃ dhanitaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2465_0: Siddhe nipphanna nibbattā, dārite bhinna bheditā;
anya-e0809n:2466_0: Channo tu chādite cātha, viddhe chiddita vedhitā.
anya-e0809n:2478_0: Bhaṭṭhaṃ tu galitaṃ pannaṃ, cutañca dhaṃsitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:2486_0: Anvesitaṃ gavesitaṃ, laddhaṃ tu patta muccate.
anya-e0809n:2489_0: Pālitaṃ atha ossaṭṭhaṃ, cattaṃ hīnaṃ samujjhitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2504_0: Ñeyyaṃ liṅga miha kvāpi, paccayatthavasena ca;
anya-e0809n:2507_0: Damo ca damatho danti, vattaṃ tu suddhakammani;
anya-e0809n:2510_0: Bhedo vidāro phuṭanaṃ, tappanaṃ tu ca pīṇanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2514_0: Ninnimittaṃ yadicchā thā’, pucchanā nandanāni ca;
anya-e0809n:2527_0: Jīraṇaṃ jāni tāṇaṃ tu, rakkhaṇaṃ pamitippamā;
anya-e0809n:2531_0: Nigādo nigado mādo, mado pasiti bandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2545_0: Majjhanhiko majjhantiko tu majjhanho, vemattaṃ tu ca nānatā.
anya-e0809n:2547_0: Vā jāgaro jāgariyaṃ jāgariyo (ṭī.), pavāho tu pavatti ca;
anya-e0809n:2559_0: Osānaṃ pariyosānaṃ, ukkaṃso’tisayo bhave avasānaṃ samāpanaṃ (?);
anya-e0809n:2563_0: Kiccaṃ tu karaṇīyañca, saṅkhāro vāsanā bhave.
anya-e0809n:2568_0: Pāṭho nipāṭho nipaṭho, vicayo magganā pume;
anya-e0809n:2582_0: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0809n:2583_0: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābha diṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n:2586_0: Pamāṇe ca pasaṃsāyaṃ, akkhare ca yase guṇe.
anya-e0809n:2592_0: Cakkaṃ sampattiyaṃ cakka, ratane maṇḍale bale.
anya-e0809n:2605_0: Attho payojane saddā, bhidheyye vuddhiyaṃ dhane;
anya-e0809n:2611_0: Guṇo paṭala rāsīsu, ānisaṃse ca bandhane;
anya-e0809n:2612_0: Appadhāne ca sīlādo, sukkādimhi jiyāya ca.
anya-e0809n:2615_0: Bhūto satta mahābhūtā, manussesu na nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2617_0: Vāccaliṅgo atītasmiṃ, jāte patte same mato;
anya-e0809n:2622_0: Anto nitthī samīpe cā, vasāne padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n:2625_0: Nikāye sandhi sāmañña, ppasūtīsu kule bhave;
anya-e0809n:2629_0: Vāsaṭṭhāne ca gamane, visaṭatte visaratta visadatte gatīritā.
anya-e0809n:2631_0: Phale vipassanā dibba, cakkhu sabbaññutāsu ca;
anya-e0809n:2637_0: Kesohāraṇa, jīvita, vuttisu vapane ca vāpasamakaraṇe;
anya-e0809n:2638_0: Kathane pamuttabhāva, jjhenādo jjhesanādo (sī.) vutta mapi tīsu.
anya-e0809n:2643_0: Sotaviññeyya satthesu, sutaṃ putte suto siyā;
anya-e0809n:2645_0: Kappo kāle yuge lese, paññatti paramāyusu;
anya-e0809n:2656_0: Byavadhāne vinaṭṭhe ca, bhede chidde manasya’pi.
anya-e0809n:2658_0: Ārogye kusalaṃ iṭṭha, vipāke kusalo tathā;
anya-e0809n:2667_0: Sevito yena yo niccaṃ, tatthāpi visayo siyā;
anya-e0809n:2668_0: Rūpādike janapade, tathā dese ca gocare.
anya-e0809n:2670_0: Bhāvo padatthe sattāya, madhippāya kriyāsu ca;
anya-e0809n:2673_0: So bandhave’ttani ca saṃ, so dhanasmi manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2674_0: Sā pume sunakhe vutto, ttaniye so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n:2676_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanake vuttaṃ, suvaṇṇo garuḷe tathā;
anya-e0809n:2679_0: Varo devādikā devādito (sī.) iṭṭhe, jāmātari patimhi ca,
anya-e0809n:2680_0: Uttame vāccaliṅgo so, varaṃ mandappiye byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2685_0: Pitāmahe jine seṭṭhe, brāhmaṇe ca pitūsvapi;
anya-e0809n:2686_0: Brahmā vutto tathā brahmaṃ, vede tapasi vuccate.
anya-e0809n:2689_0: Mekhalāyaṃ matā kacchā, kaccho vutto latāya ca.
anya-e0809n:2693_0: Pamāṇaṃ hetu satthesu, māne ca saccavādini;
anya-e0809n:2696_0: Sattaṃ dabba’ttabhāvesu, pāṇesu ca bale, siyā bale sakkā (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:2705_0: Padaṃ ṭhāne parittāṇe, nibbānamhi ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0809n:2706_0: Sadde vatthumhi koṭṭhāse, pāde tallañchane mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:2711_0: Khuddā ca makkhikābhede, madhumhi khudda, mappake;
anya-e0809n:2712_0: Adhame kapaṇe cāpi, bahumhi catūsu ttisu.
anya-e0809n:2714_0: Takke maraṇaliṅge ca, ariṭṭhaṃ asubhe subhe,;
anya-e0809n:2715_0: Ariṭṭho āsave kāke, nimbe ca pheniladdume.
anya-e0809n:2720_0: Mittakāre lañjadāne, bale rāsi vipattisu balarāsi vipattisu (ka.);
anya-e0809n:2723_0: Khandhe bhave nimittamhi, rūpaṃ vaṇṇe ca paccaye;
anya-e0809n:2724_0: Sabhāva sadda saṇṭhāna, rūpajjhāna vapūsu ca.
anya-e0809n:2726_0: Vatthu kilesa kāmesu, icchāyaṃ madane rate;
anya-e0809n:2727_0: Kāmo, kāmaṃ nikāme, cā, nuññāyaṃ kāma mabyayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2735_0: Vuddhiyaṃ janane kāma, dhātvādīmhi ca pattiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2747_0: Ārammaṇe ca saṃsaṭṭhe, vokiṇṇe nissaye tathā;
anya-e0809n:2750_0: Tīsu channaṃ patirūpe, chādite ca nigūhite;
anya-e0809n:2762_0: Viññāṇe cittakamme ca, vicitte citta muccate;
anya-e0809n:2765_0: Sāmaṃ vedantare sāntve, taṃ pīte sāmale tisu;
anya-e0809n:2766_0: Sayamatthe byayaṃ sāmaṃ, sāmā ca sārivāyapi.
anya-e0809n:2769_0: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarā’lahukesu ca.
anya-e0809n:2771_0: Accite vijjamāne ca, pasatthe sacca sādhusu;
anya-e0809n:2775_0: Devo visuddhidevā’do, megha maccu nabhesu ca;
anya-e0809n:2776_0: Athopi taruṇe satte, corepi māṇavo bhave.
anya-e0809n:2781_0: Yoni kāma siri’ssare, dhammu’yyāma yase bhagaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2782_0: Uḷāro tīsu vipule, seṭṭhe ca madhure siyā.
anya-e0809n:2784_0: Sampanno tīsu sampuṇṇe, madhure ca samaṅgini;
anya-e0809n:2785_0: Saṅkhā tu ñāṇe koṭṭhāsa, paññatti gaṇanesu ca.
anya-e0809n:2788_0: Atho māne pakāreca, koṭṭhāseca vidho dvisu.
anya-e0809n:2791_0: Ñāṇe ca somanasseca, vedo chandasi co’ccate.
anya-e0809n:2793_0: Khandhakoṭṭhāsa, passāva, magga, hetūsu yoni sā yoni so (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:2794_0: Kāle tu kūle sīmāyaṃ, velā rāsimhi bhāsitā.
anya-e0809n:2796_0: Vohāro sadda paṇṇatti, vaṇijjā cetanāsu ca;
anya-e0809n:2801_0: Rāge tu mānaso cittā, rahattesu ca mānasaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2803_0: Mūlaṃ bhe santike mūla, mūle hetumhi pābhate;
anya-e0809n:2804_0: Rūpādyaṃ’sa pakaṇḍesu, khandho rāsi guṇesu ca.
anya-e0809n:2807_0: Atho hadayavatthumhi, citte ca hadayaṃ ure.
anya-e0809n:2813_0: Ālambaro tu sārambhe, bheribhede ca dissati.
anya-e0809n:2819_0: Vissāse yācanāyañca, peme ca paṇayo mato.
anya-e0809n:2824_0: Samatthane mato citte, kaggatāyaṃ samādhi ca;
anya-e0809n:2829_0: Bhūmibhāge kilese ca, male cā’ṅgaṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n:2831_0: Dhanādidappe paññāya, abhimāno mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2832_0: Apadeso nimitte ca, chale ca kathane mato.
anya-e0809n:2834_0: Citte kāye sabhāve ca, so attā parama’ttani;
anya-e0809n:2835_0: Atha gumbo ca thambasmiṃ thambhasmiṃ (ṭī.), samūhe balasajjane.
anya-e0809n:2837_0: Antoghare kusūle ca, koṭṭho ntokucchiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2841_0: Atho sikhaṇḍe tūṇīre, kalāpo nikare mato.
anya-e0809n:2843_0: Cūḷā saṃyatakesesu, makuṭe moḷi ca dvisu;
anya-e0809n:2844_0: Saṅkho tva’nitthiyaṃ kambu, nalāṭa’ṭṭhīsu lalāṭaṭṭhīsu (sī.) gopphake.
anya-e0809n:2846_0: Pakkho kāle bale sādhye, sakhī vājesu paṅgule;
anya-e0809n:2847_0: Dese’ṇṇave pume sindhu, saritāyaṃ sa nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2849_0: Gaje kareṇu purise, so hatthiniya mitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2852_0: Visāṇaṃ tīsu mātaṅga, dante ca pasusiṅgake;
anya-e0809n:2853_0: Koṭiyaṃ tu mato koṇo, tathā vādittavādane.
anya-e0809n:2855_0: Vaṇippathe ca nagare, vede ca nigamo tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2859_0: Harite tu suvaṇṇe ca, vāsudeve harī’rito.
anya-e0809n:2862_0: Uttaṃso tva’ vataṃso ca, kaṇṇapūre ca sekhare.
anya-e0809n:2867_0: Cūḷā jālā padhāna’gga, moracūḷāsu sā sikhā;
anya-e0809n:2874_0: Aṃse sippe kalā kāle, bhāge candassa soḷase.
anya-e0809n:2882_0: Kriyacitte ca karaṇe, kiriyaṃ kammani kriyā;
anya-e0809n:2883_0: Sunisāyaṃ tu kaññāya, jāyāya ca vadhū matā.
anya-e0809n:2886_0: Suttaṃ pāvacane riṭṭhe siddhe (ṭī.), tante taṃ supite tisu.
anya-e0809n:2888_0: Rājaliṅgo’sabhaṅgesu, rukkhe ca kakudo kakudho pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2891_0: Vohāre jetu micchāyaṃ, kīḷādo cāpi devanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2892_0: Bhariyāyaṃ tu kedāre, sarīre khetta mīritaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2895_0: Sūlaṃ tu nitthiyaṃ heti, bhede saṃku rujāsu ca.
anya-e0809n:2898_0: Rathādyaṅge tu ca yugo, kappamhi yugale yugaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2900_0: Itthipupphe ca reṇumhi, rajo pakatije guṇe;
anya-e0809n:2904_0: Paṇḍake joti nakkhatta, raṃsīsva’ggimhi joti so.
anya-e0809n:2906_0: Kaṇḍo nitthī sare daṇḍe, vagge cāvasare pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2913_0: Padhāne tu ca sānumhi, visāṇe siṅga muccate.
anya-e0809n:2916_0: Heme pañcasuvaṇṇe ca, nikkho nitthī pasādhane.
anya-e0809n:2918_0: Tithibhede ca sākhādi, phaḷumhi pabba muccate;
anya-e0809n:2931_0: Sassate ca dhuvo tīsu, dhuvaṃ takke ca nicchite.
anya-e0809n:2933_0: Hare sivo, sivaṃ bhadda, mokkhesu, jambuke sivā;
anya-e0809n:2934_0: Senāyaṃ sattiyañceva, thūlatte ca balaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:2937_0: Devabhede vasu pume, paṇḍakaṃ ratane dhane.
anya-e0809n:2939_0: Nibbānaṃ atthagamane, apavagge siyā tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2943_0: Sukkaṃ tu sambhave, sukko, dhavale, kusale tisu.
anya-e0809n:2945_0: Dāyo dāne vibhattabba, dhane ca pitunaṃ vane dhane (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:2948_0: Paribhāsana makkose, niyame bhāsane tha ca,
anya-e0809n:2955_0: Tāto tāḷo (sī.) tu kuñcikāyañca, tūriyaṅge dumantare.
anya-e0809n:2957_0: Pupphe phale ca pasavo, uppāde gabbhamocane;
anya-e0809n:2967_0: Majjhimo dehamajjhasmiṃ, majjhabhave ca so tisu.
anya-e0809n:2970_0: Sobhā sampattīsu sirī, lakkhītthī devatāya ca.
anya-e0809n:2972_0: Kumāro yuvarāje ca, khande vutto susumhi ca;
anya-e0809n:2975_0: Paṇo vetana mūlesu, vohāre ca dhane mato;
anya-e0809n:2978_0: Asubhe ca subhe kamme, bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ dvaye pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2984_0: Cāge sabhāve nimmāne, saggo jjhāye divepyatha;
anya-e0809n:2985_0: Rohito lohite maccha, bhede ceva migantare.
anya-e0809n:2991_0: Dabbaṃ bhabbe guṇādhāre, vitte ca budha dārusu.
anya-e0809n:2993_0: Mānaṃ pamāṇe patthādo, māno vutto vidhāya ca;
anya-e0809n:2994_0: Atho parissame vutto, vāyāmo vīriyepi ca.
anya-e0809n:2997_0: Chidde tu chiddavante ca, susiraṃ tūriyantare.
anya-e0809n:3000_0: Atho gārava bhītīsu, saṃvege sambhamo mato.
anya-e0809n:3005_0: Māse jeṭṭho, tivuddhā’ti, ppasatthesu ca tīsu so;
anya-e0809n:3006_0: Dhamme ca maṅgale seyyo, so pasatthatare tisu.
anya-e0809n:3008_0: Ādiccādimhi gahaṇe, nibandhe ca ghare gaho;
anya-e0809n:3012_0: Bimbaṃ tu paṭibimbe ca, maṇḍale bimbikāphale.
anya-e0809n:3017_0: Samā vasse, samo kheda, santīsu, so nibhe tisu;
anya-e0809n:3021_0: Rattaṃ tu soṇite, tambā, nuratta, rañjite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3023_0: Tace kāye ca tanvitthī, tīsva’ppe viraḷe kise;
anya-e0809n:3024_0: Utubhede tu sisiro, hime so sītale tisu.
anya-e0809n:3026_0: Sakkharā guḷabhede ca, kathalepi ca dissati;
anya-e0809n:3027_0: Anuggahe tu saṅkhepe, gahaṇe saṅgaho mato.
anya-e0809n:3029_0: Dakkhe ca tikhiṇe byatte, rogamutte paṭuttisu;
anya-e0809n:3030_0: Rājā tu khattiye vutto, naranāthe pabhumhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3032_0: Khalañca dhaññakaraṇe, kakke nīce khalo bhave;
anya-e0809n:3036_0: Bhayaṅkare tu kaṭhine, kurūro tīsu niddaye.
anya-e0809n:3041_0: Adharo tīsvadho hīne, pume dantacchade pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3042_0: Sussusā sotu micchāya, sā pāricariyāya ca.
anya-e0809n:3044_0: Hattho pāṇimhi ratane, gaṇe soṇḍāya bhantare;
anya-e0809n:3045_0: Āvāṭe udapāne ca, kūpo kumbhe ca dissati.
anya-e0809n:3048_0: Vajjabhede ca vita taṃ, taṃ vitthāre tiliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3050_0: Sāro bale thiraṃse ca, uttame so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3053_0: Mandire rogabhede ca, khayo apacayamhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3054_0: Vāḷo tu sāpade sappe, kurūre so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n:3056_0: Sālo sajjaddume rukkhe, sālāgehe ca dissati;
anya-e0809n:3057_0: Sote tu savanaṃ vuttaṃ, yajane sutiyampi ca.
anya-e0809n:3059_0: Tīsu pato pareto ca, mate ca petayonije;
anya-e0809n:3060_0: Khyāte tu haṭṭhe viññāte, patītaṃ vāccaliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3062_0: Adhippāye ca ādhāre, āsayo kathito tha ca;
anya-e0809n:3063_0: Pattaṃ pakkhe dale, patto, bhājane so gate tisu.
anya-e0809n:3065_0: Kusale sukataṃ, suṭṭhu, kate ca sukato tisu;
anya-e0809n:3069_0: Assādane tu rasanaṃ, jivhāyañca dhanimhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3071_0: Paṇīto tīsu madhure, uttame vihite pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3074_0: Pāpasmiṃ gagane dukkhe, byasane cā’gha muccate;
anya-e0809n:3075_0: Samūhe paṭalaṃ netta, roge vuttaṃ chadimhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3078_0: Sattannaṃ pūraṇe seṭṭhe, tisante sattamo tisu.
anya-e0809n:3080_0: Ojā tu yāpanāyañca, ojo ditti balesu ca;
anya-e0809n:3081_0: Atho nisāmanaṃ vuttaṃ, dassane savanepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3083_0: Gabbho kucchiṭṭhasatte ca, kucchi ovarakesu ca;
anya-e0809n:3089_0: Asumhi āyumhi (ṭī.), 407-gāthā passitabbā ca bale pāṇo, satte hadayagā’nile;
anya-e0809n:3096_0: Saraṇaṃ tu vadhe gehe, rakkhitasmiñca rakkhaṇe.
anya-e0809n:3098_0: Thiyaṃ kantā piye, kanto, manuññe, so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3099_0: Gavakkhe tu samūhe ca, jālaṃ macchādibandhane.
anya-e0809n:3102_0: Sasaddhe tīsu nivāpe, saddhaṃ, saddhā ca paccaye.
anya-e0809n:3104_0: Bījaṃ hetumhi aṭṭhismiṃ, aṅgajāte ca dissati;
anya-e0809n:3109_0: Āgamane tu dīghādi, nikāyesu ca āgamo.
anya-e0809n:3111_0: Santāno devarukkhe ca, vutto santatiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3115_0: Chāyā tu ātapābhāve, paṭibimbe pabhāya ca.
anya-e0809n:3117_0: Gimhe ghammo nidāgho ca, uṇhe sedajale pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3120_0: Aṅgā dese bahumha’ṅgaṃ, aṅgo dese vapumha’ṅga (ṭī.) tathā’vayavahetusu;
anya-e0809n:3124_0: Supinaṃ supine sutta, viññāṇe ta manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3132_0: Vutto visārado tīsu, suppagabbhe ca paṇḍite;
anya-e0809n:3135_0: Drave vaṇṇe rasabhede, kasāyo surabhimhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3142_0: Kavace vāravāṇe ca, nimmokepi ca kañcuko.
anya-e0809n:3144_0: Lohabhede mataṃ tambaṃ, tambo ratte tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3147_0: Bodhane ca padāne ca, viññeyyaṃ paṭipādanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3150_0: Satthaṃ āyudha ganthesu, lohe, sattho ca sañcaye;
anya-e0809n:3154_0: Atha kambu mato saṅkhe, suvaṇṇe valayepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3157_0: Dupphasse tikhiṇe tīsu, gadrabhe kakace kharo.
anya-e0809n:3169_0: Paṭibhānaṃ tu paññāyaṃ, upaṭṭhita girāya ca.
anya-e0809n:3172_0: Udare tu tathā pācā, nalasmiṃ gahaṇī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3174_0: Piyo bhattari, jāyāyaṃ, piyā, iṭṭhe piyo tisu;
anya-e0809n:3175_0: Yamarāje tu yugaḷe, saṃyame ca yamo bhave.
anya-e0809n:3177_0: Muddikassa ca pupphassa, rase khudde madhū’ritaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3178_0: Ulloce tu ca vitthāre, vitānaṃ punnapuṃsake.
anya-e0809n:3180_0: Apavagge ca salile, sudhāyaṃ amataṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:3181_0: Mohe tu timire saṅkhyā, guṇe tama manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3183_0: Khare cā’kāriye tīsu, rasamhi purise kaṭu;
anya-e0809n:3184_0: Paṇḍake sukate, puññaṃ, manuññe pavane tisu.
anya-e0809n:3186_0: Rukkho dumamhi, pharusā, siniddhesu ca so tisu;
anya-e0809n:3187_0: Uppattiyaṃ tu hetumhi, saṅge sukke ca sambhavo.
anya-e0809n:3189_0: Nimittaṃ kāraṇe vuttaṃ, aṅgajāte ca lañchane;
anya-e0809n:3192_0: Vede ca mantane manto, mantā paññāya muccate;
anya-e0809n:3195_0: Aruṇo raṃsibhede cā, byattarāge ca lohite;
anya-e0809n:3199_0: Ākāro kāraṇe vutto, saṇṭhāne iṅgitepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3201_0: Sudditthi tanaye khattā, uggo, tibbamhi so tisu;
anya-e0809n:3204_0: Kallaṃ pabhāte, niroga, sajjadakkhesu yuttadakkhesu (ka.) tīsu taṃ;
anya-e0809n:3207_0: Kapoto pakkhibhede ca, diṭṭho pārāvate tha ca;
anya-e0809n:3210_0: Tīsu khare ca kaṭhine, kakkaso sāhasappiye sāhasappiye=sāhasa+appiye (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:3211_0: Akāriye tu guyhaṅge, cīre kopīna muccate.
anya-e0809n:3217_0: Athuppāde siyā dhūma, ketu vessānarepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3222_0: Apavagge vināse ca, nirodho rodhane pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3223_0: Bhaye paṭibhayaṃ vuttaṃ, tiliṅgaṃ taṃ bhayaṃkare.
anya-e0809n:3229_0: Upajāpe mato bhedo, visese ca vidāraṇe.
anya-e0809n:3235_0: Guṇukkaṃse ca vibhave, sampatti ceva sampadā.
anya-e0809n:3237_0: Bhūkhantīsu khamā, yogye, hite sakke yutte (ṭī.) 1001-gāthā passitabbā khamo tisu;
anya-e0809n:3238_0: Addho bhāge pathe kāle, ekaṃse’ddho’byayaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:3241_0: Usabho’sadha go usabho usabhe (ṭī.) seṭṭhe, sū’sabhaṃ vīsayaṭṭhiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3242_0: Setusmiṃ tanti pantīsu, nāriyaṃ pāḷi kathyate.
anya-e0809n:3244_0: Kaṭo jaye’tthinimitte, kilañje so kate tisu;
anya-e0809n:3247_0: Vitakke mathite takko, tathā sūciphale mato;
anya-e0809n:3251_0: Baddhanissita setesu, tīsu taṃ mihite sitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3253_0: Thiyaṃ pajāpati dāre, brahme māre sure pume;
anya-e0809n:3254_0: Vāsudeve’ntake kaṇho, so pāpe asite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3257_0: Sakko inde janapade, sākiye, so khame tisu.
anya-e0809n:3259_0: Vajjane parihāro ca, sakkāre ceva rakkhaṇe;
anya-e0809n:3260_0: Sotāpannādike agge, ariyo tīsu, dvije pume.
anya-e0809n:3262_0: Susuko susumāre ca, bālake ca ulūpini;
anya-e0809n:3265_0: Asano piyake kaṇḍe, bhakkhaṇe khipane’ sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3266_0: Yuge’dhikāre vikāre (ṭī.) vīriye, padhāne cā’ntike dhuro.
anya-e0809n:3268_0: Kāḷe ca bhakkhite tīsu, lavitte asito pume;
anya-e0809n:3271_0: Ummāre esikatthambhe, indakhīlo mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n:3274_0: Dhaññaṃ sālyādike vuttaṃ, dhañño puññavati ttisu;
anya-e0809n:3275_0: Pāṇi hatthe ca satte bhū, saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ mato.
anya-e0809n:3277_0: Tīsu pītaṃ halidyābhe, haṭṭhe ca pāyite siyā;
anya-e0809n:3280_0: Lohitādimhi lobhe ca, rāgo ca rañjane mato;
anya-e0809n:3281_0: Padaro phalake bhaṅge, pavuddha dariyaṃ pica.
anya-e0809n:3287_0: Kāro’ gabhede sakkāre, kārā tu bandhanālaye.
anya-e0809n:3290_0: Pāpane ca padātismiṃ, gamane patti nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3292_0: Chiddaṃ randhañca vivaraṃ, susire dūsanepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3293_0: Muttā tu muttike, muttaṃ, passāve, muccite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3295_0: Nisedhe vāraṇaṃ, hatthi, liṅga hatthīsu vāraṇo;
anya-e0809n:3296_0: Dānaṃ cāge made suddhe, khaṇḍane lavane khaye.
anya-e0809n:3301_0: Haritasmiñca paṇṇe ca, palāso kiṃ sukaddume;
anya-e0809n:3304_0: Pakkaṃ phalamhi, taṃ nāsu, mmukhe nāsamukhe (ka.) pariṇate tisu;
anya-e0809n:3305_0: Piṇḍo ājīvane dehe, piṇḍane goḷake mato.
anya-e0809n:3307_0: Vaṭṭo paribbaye kammā, dike, so vaṭṭule tisu;
anya-e0809n:3310_0: Nāriyaṃ bhīru kathitā, bhīruke so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3313_0: Vāmaṃ sabyamhi, taṃ cāru, viparītesu tīsva’tha;
anya-e0809n:3314_0: Saṅkhyābhede sarabye ca, cihaṇe lakkha muccate.
anya-e0809n:3327_0: Sambhave cā’suci pume, amejjhe tīsu dissati.
anya-e0809n:3329_0: Accho ikke pume vutto, pasannamhi tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3330_0: Baḷise selabhede ca, vaṅko, so kuṭile tisu.
anya-e0809n:3334_0: Sabbasmiṃ sakalo tīsu, addhamhi purise siyā.
anya-e0809n:3339_0: Rudhire lohitaṃ vuttaṃ, rattamhi lohito tisu;
anya-e0809n:3340_0: Uttamaṅge pume muddhā, muddho mūḷhe tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n:3342_0: Raṭṭhamhi vijitaṃ vuttaṃ, jite ca vijito tisu;
anya-e0809n:3343_0: Parittaṃ tu parittāṇe, paritto tīsu appake.
anya-e0809n:3348_0: Vaṅgo lohantare vaṅgā, dese pume bahumhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3349_0: Kammārabhaṇḍabhede ca, khaṭake muṭṭhi ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n:3354_0: Pume mahesī sugate, deviyaṃ nāriyaṃ matā;
anya-e0809n:3358_0: Vijjā vede ca sippe ca, tivijjādo ca buddhiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3361_0: Pajjaṃ siloke, pajjo’ddhe, pajjo pādahite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3364_0: Vidheyye assavo tīsu, pubbamhī purise siyā.
anya-e0809n:3369_0: Assattho tīsu assāsa, ppatte, bodhiddume pume;
anya-e0809n:3370_0: Tīsu luddo kurūre ca, nesādamhi pume siyā.
anya-e0809n:3372_0: Vilaggo tīsu laggasmiṃ, pume majjhamhi dissati;
anya-e0809n:3375_0: Kaṭṭhaṃ dārumhi, taṃ kicche, gahane kasite tisu;
anya-e0809n:3376_0: Sasantāne ca visaye, gocare’ jjhatta muccateti.
anya-e0809n:3379_0: Bhuvane ca jane loko, moretvaggimhi so sikhī;
anya-e0809n:3383_0: Vaṭabyāmesu nigrodho, dhaṅko tu vāyase bake;
anya-e0809n:3386_0: Ucchaṅge lakkhaṇe cā’ṅko, rasmi’tthī juti rajjusu;
anya-e0809n:3390_0: Sūraṃ’sūsu pume bhānū, daṇḍo tu muggare dame;
anya-e0809n:3398_0: Dāyādo bandhave putte, sire sīsaṃ tipumhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3403_0: Thambho thūṇa jaḷattesu, sūpo kummāsa byañjane;
anya-e0809n:3404_0: Gaṇḍo phoṭe kapolamhi, aggho mūlye ca pūjane.
anya-e0809n:3407_0: Bhāgye vidhi vidhāne ca, sare khagge ca sāyako.
anya-e0809n:3409_0: Sāraṅgo cātake eṇe, pattī tu sarapakkhisu;
anya-e0809n:3417_0: Amate tu sudhā lepe, abhikhyā nāma raṃsisu;
anya-e0809n:3418_0: Satti sāmatthiye satthe, mahī najjantare bhuvi;
anya-e0809n:3423_0: Pavatti vutti vattāsu, vetane bharaṇe bhati.
anya-e0809n:3426_0: Soppe pamāde tandī ca, yātrā gamana vuttisu.
anya-e0809n:3431_0: Icchāyaṃ jutiyaṃ kanti, rañjane sūrate rati;
anya-e0809n:3432_0: Gehe vasati vāse tha, nadī senāsu vāhinī.
anya-e0809n:3434_0: Patthe nāḷe ca nāḷi’tthī, gaṇe samiti saṅgame;
anya-e0809n:3435_0: Taṇhā lobhe pipāsāyaṃ, magga vuttīsu vattanī.
anya-e0809n:3437_0: Pāṇyaṅge nābhi cakkante, yāce viññatti ñāpane;
anya-e0809n:3438_0: Vitti tose vedanāyaṃ, ṭhāne tu jīvite ṭhiti.
anya-e0809n:3440_0: Taraṅge cā’ntare vīci, dhīratte dhāraṇe dhiti;
anya-e0809n:3441_0: Bhū bhūmiyañca bhamuke, sadde vede save suti.
anya-e0809n:3443_0: Gottaṃ nāme ca vaṃse tha, nagare ca ghare puraṃ;
anya-e0809n:3444_0: Okaṃ tu nissaye gehe, kulaṃ tu gottarāsisu.
anya-e0809n:3446_0: Heme vitte hiraññañca, paññāṇaṃ tva’ṅka vuddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3447_0: Athā’mbarañca khe vatthe, guyhaṃ liṅge rahasya’pi.
anya-e0809n:3449_0: Tapo dhamme vate ceva, pāpe tvā’gumhi kibbisaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3450_0: Ratanaṃ maṇi seṭṭhesu, vassaṃ hāyana vuṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n:3452_0: Vanaṃ arañña vārīsu, khīramhi tu jale payo;
anya-e0809n:3453_0: Akkharaṃ lipi mokkhesu, methūnaṃ saṅgame rate.
anya-e0809n:3455_0: Sotaṃ kaṇṇe payovege, riṭṭhaṃ pāpā’subhesu ca;
anya-e0809n:3459_0: Vāccaliṅgā paramito, byatto tu paṇḍite phuṭe.
anya-e0809n:3465_0: Bībhaccho vikate bhīme, komale tikhiṇe mudu;
anya-e0809n:3466_0: Iṭṭhe ca madhure sādu, sādumhi madhuro piye.
anya-e0809n:3468_0: Site tu suddhe odāto, dvijivho sūcakā’hisu;
anya-e0809n:3474_0: Suci suddhe site pūte, pesalo dakkhacārusu;
anya-e0809n:3475_0: Adhamo kucchite ūne, appiye pya’liko bhave.
anya-e0809n:3477_0: Byāpe asuddhe saṃkiṇṇo, bhabbaṃ yogye ca bhāvini;
anya-e0809n:3478_0: Sukhumo appakā’ṇūsu, vuddho there ca paṇḍite.
anya-e0809n:3480_0: Subhe sādhumhi bhaddo tha, tyā’do ca vipule bahu;
anya-e0809n:3481_0: Dhīro budhe dhitimante, vellitaṃ kuṭile dhute.
anya-e0809n:3483_0: Visado byatta setesu, taruṇo tu yuve nave;
anya-e0809n:3488_0: Kalyāṇaṃ sundare cāpi, himo tu sītalepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3490_0: Lole tu sīghe capalo, vutte udita muggate;
anya-e0809n:3491_0: Āditte gabbite ditto, piṭṭhaṃ tu cuṇṇitepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3493_0: Vigate vāyite vāyane (ka.) vītaṃ, bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3494_0: Bhajjite patite bhaṭṭho, puṭṭho pucchita posite.
anya-e0809n:3498_0: Sūro vīre ravisūre, duṭṭho kuddhe ca dūsite.
anya-e0809n:3502_0: Nindāyaṃ khepane khepo, niyamo nicchaye vate.
anya-e0809n:3513_0: Mālyaṃ tu pupphe taddāme, vāho tu sakaṭe haye.
anya-e0809n:3516_0: Bhe tārakā nettamajjhe, sīmā’ vadhi, ṭṭhitīsu ca.
anya-e0809n:3520_0: Satte thūle tīsu daḷho, latā sākhāya valliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3524_0: Nīce puthujjano mūḷhe, bhattā sāmini dhārake.
anya-e0809n:3526_0: Sikhā, piñchesu sikhaṇḍo, satte tva’ttani puggalo;
anya-e0809n:3530_0: Vacco rūpe karīse tha, juti’tthī kantiraṃsisu;
anya-e0809n:3532_0: Labbhaṃ yutte ca laddhabbe, khaṇḍe paṇṇe dalaṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:3533_0: Sallaṃ kaṇḍe salākāyaṃ, sucitte dhāvanaṃ gate;
anya-e0809n:3538_0: Mitte sahāye ca sakhā, vibhū niccappabhūsu so.
anya-e0809n:3540_0: Khagge kurūre nettiṃso, parasmiṃ atra tīsva’mu;
anya-e0809n:3545_0: Yānaṃ rathādo gamane, sarūpasmiṃ adho talaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3547_0: Majjho vilagge vemajjhe, pupphaṃ tu kusumo’tusu;
anya-e0809n:3548_0: Sīlaṃ sabhāve subbate, puṅgavo usabhe vare.
anya-e0809n:3551_0: Nettiṃse gaṇḍake khaggo, kadambo tu dume caye.
anya-e0809n:3554_0: Akkose sapathe sāpo, paṅkaṃ pāpe ca kaddame.
anya-e0809n:3557_0: Bale pabhāve vīriyaṃ, tejo tesu ca dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3559_0: Dhārā santati khaggaṅge, vānaṃ taṇhāya sibbane;
anya-e0809n:3560_0: Khattā sūte paṭihāre, vitti pīḷāsu vedanā.
anya-e0809n:3562_0: Thiyaṃ mati’cchāpaññāsu, pāpe yuddhe rave raṇo;
anya-e0809n:3563_0: Lavotu bindu’cchedesu, palāle’ palāse (ṭī.), palāpe-ṭī (453-1124) gāthā passitabbā tisaye bhusaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3565_0: Bādhā dukkhe nisedhe ca, mūlapadepi mātikā;
anya-e0809n:3569_0: Ketusmiṃ ketanaṃ gehe, ṭhāne bhūmi’tthiyaṃ bhuvi;
anya-e0809n:3570_0: Lekhye lekho rāji lekhā, pūjite bhagavā jine.
anya-e0809n:3572_0: Gadā satthe gado roge, nisajjā pīṭhesvā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3576_0: Bilaṃ koṭṭhāsa chiddesu, vajjaṃ dose ca bheriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3581_0: Yūpo thambhe ca pāsāde, ayanaṃ gamane pathe.
anya-e0809n:3594_0: Annādo āmisaṃ maṃse; Dikkhā tu yajane’ccane.
anya-e0809n:3598_0: Kusumaṃ thīraje pupphe, vānare tu budhe kavi.
anya-e0809n:3600_0: Adhare kharabhe oṭṭho, luddo tu luddakepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3601_0: Kalusaṃ tvā’vile pāpe, pāpe kali parājaye.
anya-e0809n:3603_0: Kantāro vana, duggesu, caro cāramhi cañcale;
anya-e0809n:3604_0: Janāvāse gaṇe gāmo, cammaṃ tu phalake tace.
anya-e0809n:3608_0: Sattāyaṃ bhavanaṃ gehe, lese tu khalite chalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3610_0: Veraṃ pāpe ca paṭighe, taco cammani vakkale;
anya-e0809n:3613_0: Paṭihāre mukhe dvāraṃ, pete ñāte mato tisu;
anya-e0809n:3614_0: Māso paraṇṇa kālesu, naggo tva’celakepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3616_0: Dose ghāte ca paṭigho, migādo chagale pasu;
anya-e0809n:3617_0: Arūpe cā’vhaye nāmaṃ, daro daratha bhītisu.
anya-e0809n:3627_0: Havi sappimhi hotabbe, siro seṭṭhe ca muddhani;
anya-e0809n:3628_0: Vicārepi viveko tha, sikharī pabbate dume.
anya-e0809n:3630_0: Vego jave pavāhe ca, saṅku tu khilahetisu;
anya-e0809n:3631_0: Niggahīte kaṇe bindu, varāho sūkare gaje.
anya-e0809n:3648_0: Vatthe gandhe ghare vāso, cullo khudde ca uddhane.
anya-e0809n:3658_0: Sākhāyaṃ viṭapo thambhe, sattu khajjantare dise;
anya-e0809n:3661_0: Rāge raṅgo naccaṭṭhāne, pānaṃ peyye ca pītiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3667_0: Palālo palāpo (ka.) 453-gāthā passitabbā tu bhusamhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3669_0: Matā’vāṭe caye kāsu, panisā kāraṇe raho;
anya-e0809n:3677_0: Dasā’ vatthā paṭantesu, kāraṇaṃ ghāta, hetusu.
anya-e0809n:3679_0: Hatthidāne mado gabbe, ghaṭā ghaṭana rāsisu;
anya-e0809n:3684_0: Pāne pamode pīti’tthī, iṇe givā galepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3687_0: Bhaṅgo bhede paṭe bhaṅgaṃ, chattaṃ tu chavakepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3689_0: Ñāṇe bhuvi ca bhūri’ttī, anaṅge madano dume;
anya-e0809n:3697_0: Khette vappe (pākāramūle nettajale usume ca vappo-ṭī) vappo taṭepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3702_0: Saṅghāto yugagehaṅge, khāro ūse ca bhasmani.
anya-e0809n:3711_0: Abyayaṃ vuccate dāni, cirassaṃ tu ciraṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:3712_0: Cirena cirarattāya, saha saddhiṃ samaṃ amā.
anya-e0809n:3715_0: Vajjane tu vinā nānā, antarena rite puthu.
anya-e0809n:3717_0: Balavaṃ suṭṭhu cā’tīvā, tisaye kimuta sva’ti;
anya-e0809n:3718_0: Aho tu kiṃ kimū’ dāhu, vikappe kimuto’da ca.
anya-e0809n:3722_0: He hare tha kathaṃ kiṃsu, nanu kacci nu kiṃ samā.
anya-e0809n:3725_0: Tagghe’ kaṃse sasakkañcā, ddhā kāmaṃ jātu ve have.
anya-e0809n:3727_0: Yāvatā tāvatā yāva, tāva kittāvatā tathā;
anya-e0809n:3730_0: Yathā tathā yatheve’vaṃ, yathānāma yathāhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3731_0: Seyyathāpye’vamevaṃ, vā, tatheva ca yathāpi ca.
anya-e0809n:3733_0: Evampi ca seyyathāpi, nāma yatharivā’pi ca;
anya-e0809n:3736_0: Saṃ sāmañca sayaṃ cātha, āma sāhu lahū’pi ca;
anya-e0809n:3741_0: Asākalye tu cana ci, nipphale tu mudhā bhave.
anya-e0809n:3743_0: Kadāci jātu tulyā’tha, sabbato ca samantato;
anya-e0809n:3744_0: Parito ca samantāpi, atha micchā musā bhave.
anya-e0809n:3746_0: Nisedhe na anomā’laṃ, nahi cetu sace yadi;
anya-e0809n:3750_0: Īsaṃ kiñci manaṃ appe, sahasā tu atakkite;
anya-e0809n:3755_0: Taṅkhaṇe sajju sapadi, balakkāre pasayha ca.
anya-e0809n:3757_0: Sudaṃ kho vo (ka.) assu yagghe ve,hā’dayo padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n:3758_0: Antarena’ntarā anto, vassaṃ nūna ca nicchaye.
anya-e0809n:3760_0: Ānande sañca diṭṭhā tha, virodhakathane nanu;
anya-e0809n:3764_0: Nīcaṃ appe, mahatyu’ccaṃ, atha pāto page samā.
anya-e0809n:3768_0: Bahiddhā bāhirā bāhye, sīghetu saṇikaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:3770_0: Atthaṃ adassane duṭṭhu, nindāyaṃ, vandane namo;
anya-e0809n:3771_0: Sammā suṭṭhu pasaṃsāyaṃ, atho sattāya matthi ca.
anya-e0809n:3775_0: Tato pare parasuve, hiyyotu divase gate.
anya-e0809n:3777_0: Yattha yatra yahiṃcātha, tattha tatra tahiṃtahaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3778_0: Atho uddhañca upari, heṭṭhā tu ca adho samā.
anya-e0809n:3780_0: Codane iṅgha handā’tha, ārādūrā ca ārakā;
anya-e0809n:3781_0: Parammukhā tu ca raho, sammukhā tvā’vi pātu ca.
anya-e0809n:3784_0: Nidassane iti’tthañca, evaṃ, kicche kathañci ca.
anya-e0809n:3788_0: Tiro tu tiriyaṃ cātha, kucchāyaṃ duṭṭhu ku’ccate.
anya-e0809n:3790_0: Suvatthi āsiṭṭhatthamhi, nindāyaṃ tu dhī dhi (ka.) kathyate;
anya-e0809n:3791_0: Kuhiñcanaṃ kuhiṃ kutra, kuttha kattha kahaṃ kva tha.
anya-e0809n:3795_0: Kadā kudācanaṃ cātha, tadāni ca tadā samā.
anya-e0809n:3800_0: Dassane tappare saṅge, pasaṃsā, gati, suddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3813_0: Pātubhāve viyoge ca, nisedhādo ni dissati;
anya-e0809n:3814_0: Atho nīharaṇe cevā, varaṇādo ca nī siyā.
anya-e0809n:3816_0: Uddhakamma viyoga tta, lābha titti samiddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3824_0: Sammā bhusa saha ppatthā, bhimukhatthesu saṅgate;
anya-e0809n:3828_0: Viyoge kalahe pātu, bhāve bhāse ca kucchane.
anya-e0809n:3831_0: Padhāna dakkhatā kheda, sahatthādo vi dissati.
anya-e0809n:3833_0: Viyoge jānane cā’dho,bhāga nicchaya bhāga’nicchaya (bhāga+anicchaya-ṭī) suddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3839_0: Dese lakkhaṇa vicche’ttha, mbhūta bhāgādike anu.
anya-e0809n:3843_0: Soka byāpana tatvesu, lakkhaṇādo siyā pari.
anya-e0809n:3856_0: Su sobhane sukhe sammā, bhusa suṭṭhu samiddhisu.
anya-e0809n:3867_0: Sambhāvane ca garahā, pekkhāsu ca samuccaye;
anya-e0809n:3870_0: Niddese vajjane pūjā, pagate vāraṇepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3871_0: Padussane ca garahā, corikā’do siyā apa.
anya-e0809n:3893_0: Pasaṃsāgarahāsaññā, sīkārādo svīkāra (ṭī.) pi nāma tha;
anya-e0809n:3902_0: Pācī, pura, ṅgatotthesu, puratthā paṭhame pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3915_0: Nu saṃsaye ca pañhe tha, nānā’ nekattha vajjane;
anya-e0809n:3916_0: Kiṃ tu pucchājigucchāsu, kaṃ tu vārimhi muddhani.
anya-e0809n:3918_0: Amā sahasamīpe tha, bhede appaṭhame puna;
anya-e0809n:3921_0: Patīcī carime pacchā, sāmi tvaddhe jigucchane;
anya-e0809n:3926_0: Bhiṃsāpane hiṃsāpane (ṭī.) dhī dhi (ka.) nindāyaṃ, pidhāne tiriyaṃ tiro.
anya-e0809n:3928_0: Tuna tvāna tave tvā tuṃ, dhā so thā kkhattu, meva ca;
anya-e0809n:3929_0: To tha tra hiñcanaṃ hiṃhaṃ, dhi ha hi dha dhunā rahi.
anya-e0809n:3931_0: Dāni vodācanaṃ dājja, thaṃ tattaṃ jjha jju ādayo;
anya-e0809n:3944_0: Iha yo kusalo matimā sa naro,
anya-e0809n:3956_0: Kittiyā viya sambādhī, katā khettehi vāpihi.
